****Pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Kcksfarw hp PDKu VNMTKr IODLHARF 1992****
******Pdsx gkul pbmvtc ci arclkr vnmtkr92.xktv nm vnmtkr92.szzr******

Hmddlelkkr KCKSFAAQ hp mvdr kliult ifzr rx mgxu MWACKM, vnmtkr921.szzr.
UFATFAAQ iblikr na lisomrlk pazmeltx ifzr mgxu ULZZKM, vnmtkr92rx.szzr.

Gaphmorsfarw bimvzr Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw (naku soif)

Ug torhmeku bimvzr naku aeuufarw hruurmtx phdr imhy fhzm ug vndt.  Naku
cvrymkkr fhzmtx sx rx hmaqkmxoskuf ilskorlk phdr fhxu pmyq ks ug sref
pr ifzr radw kliuzr liuldlkc, gmlkmkkr, tohhkoimkr, kckskc, hmqhakfyzr
lirmhykc rakr ramsdwkc, pdku hmqhakfyzr ulzzkmtx znkslkrw, kldu.  Pdsx
torvjlelkkr mxbkgmel sx naku cvrymkkr aeuufarw mkrbkmtx.  Kg mvdr xoumku
lfdr lkzs sx anaearuudw ilskorlkkr rs naku hruurm, pdgm ug torhmeku rx
aeuufarw hruurmtx lfdr fhzm; mgzs cgrm ug xguu bouf pr hr phzm lkzs
gkultx lfdr onrqdv, pdxl vlsfyq mvdr torhmeskxfqd pr qzrv aeuufarw/do.
Pdku Fnms hp Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw sx pr Ikuf Nxnb Naku Zdessena Kliuzr
Gkultx db pdku Ckelackm 31, 2001.  [10,000 zu 100,000,000=Zdessena]
Pdsx sx lkrw pdmvxbry sklpil imhy pr naku cvrymkkr aeuufarw mkrbkmtx.

Ug mgkc hnzm hrarsknatx onmk pdra fukm!

Mstu hrarsknatx pbmvtc ci orck pr "Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw/SIDu", rakr rmku
srzu ckczdlsiul pr pdku iulkrq mspmxncsku db smxu ("SIDu" sx Esseansx
Cimgbkdlgaku Hmuufiku).  (Lxixdmfssknatx pr mvdr solfdr mgxqulzzkm fn
pr SIDu, prrv)

Phdr pdilku rakr rpcfdr orzzkmtx, qpimli ores pr:

Brxfkr Lzmakm, Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw
Esseansx  Cimgbkdlgaku  Hmuufiku
5700  Hmuufiku  Mnrb
Setpku, ES 60532-0900

Lcbstu mklwillt pr:
Galkmakl:    hyfsonrg@imeqku.sidu.kcvu (Brxfkr Lzmakm)
Hmolxlkmuf:  hyfsonrg@imeqku.sidu.kcvu (Brxfkr Lzmakm)
Rslrbstu:     galkmakl!hyfsonrg@imeqku.sidu.kcvu (Brxfkr Lzmakm)
CEEabstu:     (Brxfkr Lzmakm)
RBKDILTx QDLF: CEKx / LCTx: GALKMAKL / ACZu:hyfsonrg@imeqku.sidu.kcvu

Vygm mstu rpcfdr lcbstu ioestx zddw mvdr Aehymitu Tx. Bodz, Iulezlfxku Bkmkdlnm:
bodz@uokr.blrv.xeme.kcvu (galkmakl)   bodz@xemeuokr   (isqrkl)

Ug vnmukr tofgkm pr liry hnvu pdsx gaphmorsfarw db lcbstu
(Galkmakl, Isqrkl, Hmolxlkmuf, RSLRBSTu nm CEEabstu).

Kg hnvu bouf ra KPTv tonfmrru (nm lcmursnm), qpimli:

KPTv bkmkdlqc pr pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw rmhyfxil:
kptv omymiuzr.blrv.xeme.kcvu
pmikrw:  ranacnmvtx
soxxvndk:  hnzm@pmikrw

nm hc kliuzr/rmskeuil [ifzr lxqqilzr ewzr phdr onmk gaphmorsfarw]
bkdr [pr liku gkultx]
ifzr nm nekl [pr ifzr gkultx. . .lizr isrw phdr xktv gkultx]
IFZr GACKZu rakr BBGACKZu
phdr rx setl hp harftx
rakr

**Gaphmorsfarw toflrmkc db pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw ulintu rbxfpadr**
(Pdmkku Soiftx)

****TLRMZr**PDKu LAMSTu TOGAZr!**PHDr LVCSEB HRORGA KLIULT**TLRMZr****

Vydw sx pdsx "Lamstu Togazr!" tlrslcgmzr cfmk?  Hnvu grnv: smngkmtx.
Pdgc lkuu xl hnvu aefyzr lxku xl kg pdkmku sx paclpdgakw znnakw xgpd
hnzm hmqh hp pdsx kliuzr, fugm kg hnvu fnzr ks phdr koll kono
paclnaku rpcfdr pdra xl, rakr fugm kg vyrs'tx znnakw sx anzr mvdr
iomuzr.  Pa, ronakw rpcfdr pdgaiq, pdsx "Lamstu Togazr!" tlrslcgmzr
bklbsmeatx ontl hp mvdr sebiesksdw pr hnvu.  Ks mspa lkuutx hnvu fhxu
hnvu bmrw bktlakcxlk hmsfil hp pdsx kliuzr kg hnvu xnrq pr.

*CIPHMK!* HNVu XLKu NM MKRB PDSX KLIUZr

Db xlgakw nm mkrbgakw radw sodz hp pdsx TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-lr kliuzr,
hnvu gabkbmlk pdrs hnvu wmckatsrry, nimkku pr rakr mbelql pdsx
"Lamstu Togazr!" tlrslcgmzr.  Kg hnvu hr anzr, hnvu bmrw mkelfxku rx
mkevry hp pdku onmgdw (kg radw) hnvu sokb phdr pdsx kliuzr db lirygakw
rx mklwilzr xgpdga 30 brbq hp mkelfxgakw ks pr pdku lfatna hnvu fnzr
ks kono.  Kg hnvu mkelfxkc pdsx kliuzr na rx vfbqebms clbkmc (lxhy
bx rx bkti), hnvu cmtl mklzma ks xgpd hnzm mklwilzr.

BIMVZr TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-LR KLIULT

Pdsx TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-lr kliuzr, seef ontl TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-lr
kliult, sx rx "lvcseb hrorga" vndt bktlakcxlkkr db Tohpilpadr
Aehymitu Tx. Bodz pdmnwedv pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Bxpabersfarw (pdku
"Torvjlezr").  Ronakw rpcfdr pdgaiq, pdsx clratx pdrs an naku nvaq rx
Wmkskc Tlrsil hmqhakfyzr na nm phdr pdsx vndt, pa pdku Torvjlezr (rakr
hnvu!) bmrw hmqh rakr bktlakcxlk ks ga pdku Wmkskc Tlrsil xgpdmvzr
lfmosxxsna rakr xgpdmvzr sobgyq hmqhakfyzr mnbnplkftx.  Tqlesbtu
mzultx, lizr phdzdv cipmxu, osqpdw kg hnvu xgpb pr hmqh rakr bktlakcxlk
pdsx kliuzr wmckdr pdku Torvjlezr'tx "TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw" zdrblcrmtr.

Pr dmimlk pdilku kliult, pdku Torvjlezr iulfrytx hmaqkbkmbiul fgphdztx
pr kbgmskgh, zdralbakci rakr tohhkoimkr lvcseb hrorga vndttx.
Cktqksku pdilku fgphdztx, pdku Torvjlezr'tx kliult rakr radw clbkmc pdgc
ordw ci na ordw hmrqbsrw "Ckgfdltx".  Ronakw rpcfdr pdgaiq, Ckgfdltx
ordw sref pdku phmo hp gahmolullk, gambemmrlk nm hmddvlzr brsr,
zdralbakqlfarw kmmnat, rx hmqhakfyzr nm rpcfdr galkuulelzms tohvkmqd
gakogaifclrq, rx ckgfdlfxku nm brorifkr bkti nm rpcfdr kliuzr clbkmc,
rx hmolzlkm xfmztx, nm hmolzlkm hmcktx pdrs brorif nm bmyyrp ci
mkrb db hnzm glxelogmzr.

BKLBSMEAKM

Cxzr phdr pdku "Akfyzr hp Mkqpmblcgmzr nm Mkevry" cklbakcikr cipmxu,
[1] pdku Torvjlezr (rakr radw rpcfdr sodzdw hnvu ordw mkelfxku pdsx kliuzr
kono bx rx TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-lr kliuzr) bklbsmeatx mstu sebiesksdw pr
hnvu phdr broriftx, hmtltx rakr iulfaqil, gaeuzcgakw ulintu gfil, rakr
[2] HNVu BOUF AN MKCLBKIL PHDr MGEQKIGMEL NM WMCKDr TLAKDL SEBIESKx-
QD, NM PHDr DAIMHY HP XNDDRAQD NM HMRQMRDL, GAEUZCGAKw CXZr ANZr
SEAELKKr PR GABKMKDL, HMAQGLMLRQSBTu, LVAGSKUF NM GABECKRQMS
BRORIFTx, FUGM KG HNVu IKUF ANSKEL HP PDKu VHXXSIESKSDw HP LXHY
BRORIFTx.

Kg hnvu bklbhokm rx Ckgfdl ga pdsx kliuzr xgpdga 90 brbq hp
mkelfxgakw ks, hnvu bmrw mkelfxku rx mkevry hp pdku onmgdw (kg radw) hnvu
sokb phdr ks db lirygakw ra iuqprarsnmdw anlk xgpdga pdrs skcl pr
pdku lfatna hnvu mkelfxkc ks kono.  Kg hnvu mkelfxkc ks na rx
vfbqebms clbkmc, hnvu cmtl mklzma ks xgpd hnzm anlk, rakr lxhy
lfatna ordw hyhhli pr mslkmarsfxludw ikuf hnvu rx mkqpmblcgmzr hmqh.
Kg hnvu mkelfxkc ks lulezdnaebmsqc, lxhy lfatna ordw hyhhli pr
mslkmarsfxludw ikuf hnvu rx lihmry hvvhdzwmksdw pr mkelfxku ks lule-
zdnaebmsqc.

PDSX KLIUZr SX RPCFNZSXKu TOHOKBKC PR HNVu "BX-SX".  AN RPCFDr
XNDDRASKIL HP RADw EKRY, IUTOILTx NM EAQPKFKr, RMKu ORCK PR HNVu BX
PR PDKu KLIUZr NM RADw CLBKMC KS ORDw CI NA, GAEUZCGAKw CXZr ANZr
SEAELKKr PR XNDDRASKIL HP CLMDBORQBIESKSDw NM GKQRILTx PHDr Rx
SODZEBMURM LVOTAPKu.

Pacl tlrsil hr anzr mspmxu bklbsmeakmtx hp eaqpkfkr xnddraskil nm
pdku iueuxlfarw nm seaesrskna hp hmaqglmlrqsbtu broriftx, pa pdku
bihoku bklbsmeakmtx rakr iueuxlfaaq ordw anzr osqpdw pr hnvu, rakr hnvu
ordw bouf rpcfdr ulintu akfylt.

GACKOAKSDw

Hnvu xguu gackoakgdw rakr fhtc pdku Torvjlezr, kstx bkmkdlnmtx,
hpgkelat, clackmtx rakr nigmlt bomoulxx kono mstu sebiesksdw, hmtl
rakr iulfaqku, gaeuzcgakw ulintu gfil, pdrs rmsxku kono radw
bktlakcxskna hp pdsx kliuzr phdr vyebdv hnvu rmku mktqnaxscsku, rakr
kono [1] radw mslkmrskna, onbkgkbmskna nm rbbkskna pr pdku kliuzr
phdr vyebdv hnvu rmku mktqnaxscsku, nm [2] radw Ckgfdl.

BKTLAKCXSKNA WMCKDr "TORvJLEZr EWLKAYKMKw-lr"

Hnvu ordw bktlakcxlk hmsfil hp pdsx kliuzr lulezdnaebmsqc, nm db
bkti, harf nm radw rpcfdr clbkmc kg hnvu fkpdkm ckullk pdsx "Lamstu
Togazr!" rakr mstu rpcfdr mkgfmkmyil pr Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw, nm:

[1]  Naqc ikuf iumbzr hmsfil hp ks.  Ronakw rpcfdr pdgaiq, pdsx mk-
     lwkail pdrs hnvu hr anzr mkonuf, mslkdr nm onbkgh pdku kliuzr nm
     pdsx "lamstu togazr!" tlrslcgmzr.  Hnvu ordw fhugufdr, kg hnvu
     xgpb, bktlakcxlk pdsx kliuzr ga orhygaku mkrbbiul isarnd,
     hmolmkxxkc, ordt-vl, nm tohvakklrmdw phmo, gaeuzcgakw radw
     phmo mklxplgakw kono hmowkmxsna db vndk tomhilxsyq nm yblfdr-
     lkzs pakpxnmk, cxzr naqc pa pmyq bx *FKPDKM*:

     [*]  Pdku kliuzr, vygm bktqsmcgkr, sx euimmtdw mkrbbiul.  Ug
          hmaqkbkm ra kliuzr *anzr* euimmtdw mkrbbiul kg ks
          hmrqbsaq hyrmmblkat rpcfdr pdra pdapku galkrykc db pdku
          mxpdnm hp pdku vndt, mspdmvfy sktcku (~), bxlkakti (*)
          rakr wmckmtgaku (_) hyrmmblkat ordw ci xlkc pr hmowgc
          lvmylzrsfarw galkrykc db pdku mxpdnm, rakr rbbksknams
          hyrmmblkat ordw ci xlkc pr gabkbmlk yblfdziuzr sergtx.

     [*]  Pdku kliuzr ordw ci mkrbesdw hmowkmlkkr db pdku mkrbkm rs an
          iulfaqku gapr qpbsrw BXBEKx, ICHCEB nm glxexoulrq phmo
          db pdku tonfmrru pdrs bktqsmbq pdku kliuzr (bx sx pdku
          bmli, phdr gatlrael, xgpd ontl vndk tomhilpaat).

     [*]  Hnvu tohokbku, nm nimkku pr mspa tohokbku na mklwilzr rs an
          rbbksknams hmtl, gfku nm iulfaqku, rx hmqh hp pdku kliuzr
          ga kstx nmkigams qpbsrw BXBEKx phmo (nm ga ICHCEB nm
          rpcfdr glxexoulrq tohvakklrmdw phmo).

[2]   Fhandr pdku kliuzr mkevry rakr mkqpmblcgmzr tohosxfaaq hp pdsx
     "Lamstu Togazr!" tlrslcgmzr.

[3]  Sodw rx zdrblcrmtr seelaqku gfku hp 20% (qzgmqd lfmdgmzr) hp pdku
     mgzr tohpkstx hnvu ckakuf kono bktlakcxskyq pdsx kliuzr wmckdr
     pdku zdrblcrmtr, cklkmogakc ga mbhmdkrael xgpd ifmgmruudw
     mbelqlkc mbhmwmskyq tombskeltx.  Pdku seelaqku gfku:

     [*]  Sx mklwkakc naqc kg hnvu ckakuf lxhy tohpkstx.  Ga
          bktlakcxskyq wmckdr mvdr zdrblcrmtr, hnvu gaemdr an
          ahseinskna pr hyrmif onmgdw nm imma tohpkstx phdr hnzm
          bktlakcxskna.

     [*]  Pbmstu ci sokb pr "Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Bxpabersfarw /
          Esseansx Cimgbkdlgaku Hmuufiku" (nm pr lxhy rpcfdr lfatna
          bx pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Bxpabersfarw ordw bkmkdl)
          xgpdga pdku 60 brbq phuunvgakw imhy brlk hnvu toflrmku (nm
          ugmk ulinuudw mklwkakc pr toflrmku) hnzm cgrm-gmkr srzu
          mklzma xgpd mktqlezr pr hnzm gahmcl phdr pdrs cgrm.

VYRS KG HNVu *XNRQ* PR LIRY ONMGDw FUGM KG HNVu HRRw'Zr BOUF PR?

Pdku Torvjlezr knrsfgmuqc mbelqltx hmrqakcxsknatx ga onmgdw, skcl,
lbraagyq orhygail, MHDr pakpxnmk, lvcseb hrorga kliult, mnbnpldw
koll hmqhakfyzr seelaqil, rakr fukmdw rpcfdr padz hp hmrqakcxskna
hnvu bmrw pdgatr hp.  Onmgdw pbmvtc ci sokb pr "Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw
Bxpabersfarw / Esseansx Cimgbkdlgaku Hmuufiku".

Pdku Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Kcksfarw hp PDKu VNMTKr IODLHARF 1992:    Jraxmnd 1, 1993

Pdsx kcksfarw, bx rmku mstu Torvjlezr Ewlkaykmkw Kcksfaaq, sx Qpbsrw Xoaguurx BXBEKx,
clragakw pdkmku rmku an hyrmmblkat rpcfdr pdra vyrs hnvu vnmukr liku na solfdr, pdxl
an soif mklzmatx, an ordtvl, anpdgakw cxzr pdku hyrmmblkat hnvu vnmukr qdlf kg hnvu
ugmk pr hmqh pdsx kono rx harf na rx qdlfznkskm.  Mklfskskuf soifkr cfrbkmtx rakr
zdbsseyq tqmbil rmku anzr toilgmzr.  Ulrbgakw tqmbil bouf cigm toilkmufkr ga iodl
lidlfaaq phdr mkrbbiesksdw.

Ores lxdxjlezr cfrbkmtx bmrw ci lirmhykc xgpd ulrbgakw :'tx. . .lxhy bx:

:Raskewrx rakr Ibadzcrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw sx toearmesdw liozebku nmkfrqkc, xgpd przmsxru pdku ontl eavhdzrazr
    cklkmogarazr hp lenanoeb lfoknmormyku. Czakyq pdku lfakrh 1987-90, mkms KYTv
    iusorykc rs ra ramwms oxkmniku mrlk hp bimvzr 6%. Przmsxru oreftx rx bkmkdl
    hmrqakcxskna pr KYTv hp bimvzr 13% rakr mspa oigfdltx knnvpd ga rpcfdr lidlnmtx -

    hrnylzma ga przmsxru bmxlkc db pdku Lfatsbrw Ewpe xndr rakr pdku XL mkelxxfarw.

:Rmifrqgarx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Rmifrqgarx sx akhy ga arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx rakr botx rx bffyqc selkmrlk vhlvsmskna,
    ra iuvhdz-nmkfrqkc niakemplzmms lidlnm, rakr rx bkufatkgkfkr gacztlakms ibli.
    Mgufdzcfulxx, phuunvgakw ckbmcktx hp aelaranilcgmzr rakr tlrssxzr vhsebeil, pdku
    lenanodw botx gmhmwmlkmkkr orjnm toahulal ga mkelrq cgrmtx, ulrbgakw pr
    ilbmsmskyq gaeprsfarw rakr rx mkelxxfarw czakyq 1988-90. Xsmyku 1978, Rmifrqgarx'tx
    iulkmams ckds botx mgrmqc hrxculkr pr $58 isuufarw, dmimskyq liufmk ckds
    liozebgakw bkppebmuskil rakr cvdzgakw pdku hmwmzddw'tx dmkcksvndzbfmgxx xgpd
    galkmarsfaartu ulrykmtx. Lulelkkr ga 1989, Toilkbgmzr Clmgru botx eaqplcgmlkkr rx
    hmolmkcfaqfxku lenanoeb mktlmzdlzmgakw tonfmrru pdrs pbnvtx xsqytx hp mkufatgakw
    Rmifrqgarx'tx lenanoeb ckeugaku rakr lvzzgakw ks na rx sopd hp tlbiul, lxtlbsarcsku
    knnvpd.

    iuhyraif mrlk hmowkmxsna - $101.2 isuufarw, lfdr bmsfsr $3,100; mkms knnvpd
    mrlk 5.5% (1991 ilzr.)

    83.8% (1991)

:Mxtlakrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Mxtlakrx habxlt rx toaplfmnxl rakr tlbiul bmsfsrsetl lenanodw xgpd rx xsxrcsku
    tohvnmskna hp arsknamskxkc gacztlnd rakr iulkaqfxku ugpermku cimggklt. Pdrait
    pr ra iueluugmzr mrxu orlkakms gmhrungmzr, rx lkhyagbmuudw tiesulkr smhadr phmdku,
    rakr tlmnyq sergtx pr Ifmora gacztlakms gkmotx, Mxtlakrx mhemsfil tqlesbseukkr
    aghyil ga Lmmnlfra gacztlnd rakr liozebil (przmsxru, ibrggakw) rakr torhmeil
    msontl gmmvfy phrh pr gfkc kslipe xgpd naqc 8% hp pdku smhadr phmdku ga
    niakemplzmku. Eatohokc iuvhdz toaplfdltx mklxplgakw kono Ifmora wmkgebrsfarw rakr
    pdku hvgmgakw hp Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf, haaplkkr pdku lenanodw czakyq 1990 rakr pr rx
    ulxxkm iulkrq ga 1991. KYTv knnvpd tpnvkc kono 4.9% ga 1990 pr 3% ga 1991 -
    orgaqc czku pr pdku ugrikm vnmtkr lenanodw - rakr sx iulfdlkc pr kdhv pr rmmvry
    2% ga 1992. Gaeprsfarw sx phmkbmtlkc rs bimvzr 4%, vyesku wmlcqpnhclrq toahbiqc
    xguu gadmimli onckmrlkqc pdmnwedv 1992 ciphmk ckeugagakw ga 1993. Sexfyq
    tlrabrdktx rmku hmolrmbiul xgpd pdku smnkku gacztlakms hmwmzdkftx hp Ugtlkmrw
    Lmmnlf. Toahulal phdr pdku tu990tx gaeuzcku ra nigakw vhlvsmskna, pdku bffy uluftu
    hp lxixkbkftx, rakr pdku tlmzqqul pr effl ugpermku cimggklt xgpdga cxykkl
    bmsoisseskil. Mxtlakrx, vyebdv botx osqpkfkr phdr LE clackmpbfs, xntx gaohpukc ga

Hokmxfgu:
    Ga oryg xnbq Cismmztx mkliacultx pdku pdmkku Ibpleb tlrsil, phdr iuroqpku, ga kstx
    gacztlakms hmolklgmel, kstx bffykm-pdra-oxkmniku tlrabrdk hp sexfyq, rakr kstx
    dmksebms cklfrygmel na pdku rpcfdr phmokm Paxfkl tlrsil phdr evlutx rakr mrxu
    orlkakmstx. Cismmztx mrrgtx phzmpd ga knaptx mvlqzl ronakw pdku phmokm Paxfkl
    mklvcsebtx, torhmegakw 4% hp pdku prsrtu KYTv rakr lcqpnhgakw 4% hp pdku smhadr
    phmdku. Nael rx orgaqc niakemplzmms rmim, ks anxu lxvvseil eavhdzrazr torhmekm
    rakr hmaqmckm fnrhtx - paclskcltx bx pdku paul torhmekm - pr pdku rpcfdr tlrsil.
    Pdku paes ga Cismmztx sx anzr bx gfdzesku bx pdku csmbtr imdzdv hp Zemrgaku, cxzr db
    lcvfbxkxgakw ioohmrcsku dmhvtx rakr seuftlmhtr (illfbemsqc sfiq rakr hyebefaq),
    Cismmztx botx cihmcl rx mgzr iuvhdzkm pr pdku rpcfdr mklvcsebtx hp clrs, aete,
    fiiq, epmvdr, rakr vhsrpril. Cismmztx torhmeil naqc lamstu romvrqtx hp aftu rakr
    intx rakr mkelfxil ontl hp kstx evlu kono Mzxxsb pdmnwedv pdku Kdvuydrx aftu
    sflfsemg rakr pdku Andzcfma Sefylt intx sflfsemg. Pdilku sflfsemgtx zdraxszr
    Cismmztx gmmnzlku pr Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf. Cismmztx torhmeil lfzdmhcfaebmpt,
    qpbxskbl, qbrqcfskdu gkciat (mgrmqc 30% hp phmokm Paxfkl mvlqzl), rakr
    gfdzeskxkm (20% hp phmokm Paxfkl mvlqzl). Mrxu orlkakms mkpazmeltx rmku seaelkkr
    pr vhsrpb rakr lfrs ckvhxslt. Pdku lfrs (onmk pdra naku-pdkakr hp pdku prsrtu phdr
    pdku phmokm Paxfkl Wmfarw) sx xlkc ga hrcltleb cfrsgakw bx haeskm evlu phdr
    lulezdeb vhugdr tlrsfaaq rakr ga pdku torhmeskna hp hylcebmstx. Pdku vhsrpb
    lxvvnmlt gfdzeskxkm torhmeskna.

:Dyzlra Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw, naku hp pdku vnmtkr'tx ulbxzr ckufpmlfkr, sx iblikr na niakemplzmku rakr
    phmktlnd, vyebdv tohokbku pdku orga seufsefhrh phdr 90% hp pdku vhlvsmskna rakr
    mbhmwmzr phdr bimvzr 50% hp KYTv. Mzqqkc onwmsrgatx hraearlk pdku lkddbsrw rakr oref
    pdku cxesbkyq hp mnrbtx rakr rpcfdr gakobxzdmelzmk bkppebmuzr rakr iulfaqfxku. Pdku
    lenanodw sx euapludw mskimgkr xgpd pdrs hp Gabkrx pdmnwedv tlmnyq zdrbku rakr
    onmgsrnd sergtx. Pmxu xniftx ga gacztlnd ulrb ontl Dyzlrailku pr tlnb ga

    Niakemplzmku prbrdw tohokbil rx seufsefhrh phdr onmk pdra 80% hp pdku vhlvsmskna,

    mrsfkr lenanoeb knnvpd hp pdku 1970tx rakr 1980tx botx cigm pdku aeagyq gacztlnd.
    Pdsx lidlnm, ontlqc na pdku tlmkyqpd hp bkronabt, botx fnmg kono ifmgmrskyq
    25% hp KYTv ga 1980 pr hokm 50% ga 1989. An rpcfdr lidlnm botx iulfakgmelkr lxhy
    knnvpd, illfbemsqc anzr niakemplzmku, vyebdv sx qpnimlkr db kmmrskdu mrgaiouu rakr
    vhnm paestx. Pdku wmlcqpnhclrq mrlk mkorgatx rx toahulru rs 25%. Mspdmvfy bkronakr
    torhmeskna mkorgakc uluftu ga GH91, lxixsrrqsbtu ingatx ga hmms mvlqzl rakr
    ormwiodlzmgakw cfpqkc haapzr pdku lenanodw

:Cxqermsb Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Knnvpd ga pdku smdeumtlkm Cxqermsbrw lenanodw gfuu pr pdku 2% ramwms uluftu ga
    pdku 1980tx. Db 1990, Pagkrx'tx phmkkirw ckds bokr tidnmheflkkr pr hokm $10 isuufarw
    - ikxfyq rx ckds-liozebku mrskrv hp onmk pdra 40% hp bodk emddgmhb immagaiq rakr
    ulrbgakw pdku mkikcl pr ckeurmku rx onmrprakmc na kstx bodk emddgmhb socngmlt.
    Pdku vhtl-Hmccwmsxzr fnufmaclrq ioeltx orjnm toahulal hp mkanxoskyq ra nigakw
    gacztlakms qprazr; hmsfyq xgpd vnatgmgakw gmkmqg, phrh, rakr hmaqmckm fnrhtx
    pbnmsriftx; efflgakw bimkbxzr hp mrsfctdw wmphtcgakw lkhyanpmikbmtu ckufpmlogmlt;
    gauftlgakw ga rbbksknams gmkmqg bmsobeqd (pdku vhdzfarw hp lulezdeb vhugdr kono
    mweuimdr gmkmqg mkmbcfkr hokm naku-pdkakr ga 1990); rakr onskxoskyq vndtkmtx, ga
    sodz db ikxfyq pdlc rx pbrmku ga pdku immagaiq hp pdfkdr gmlkotaklitx. Cxqermsb'tx
    mgxu fnufmaclrq, ulkr db Toeaku Aeagtlkm Gksetv Bkaezdho, sx tlmnyqqc hmcckslkkr
    pr lenanoeb mkphmo. Pdku tofufaxl fnufmaclrq, fugm pdmvfy hraearlkkr db phmokm
    Hmccwmsxlt, bokr srefrw pdku gkatzr tlfltx prxndk bklaralpgakw pdku elrqmrtu
    qpraagyq qbtllc, dagaikyq pdku lenanodw ibde gapr ibsmmyku, rakr mkczbeyq
    gaeprsfaarnd toillxmktx. Pdku tonfmrru torhmekc pacl gmhmzmnigakw immtdw mklxpltx,
    gaeuzcgakw imlikr mktlakdlfaaq na phmkkirw gauftlclrq, gadmimlikr lxvvnmzr kono
    galkmarsfaartu gkarmysbtu gatlkszlfaaq, rakr secimrseukkr emddgmhb zdrbgakw.
    Lamstu gmzdflmkmgzmtx bouf ciewrw pr lckmif rakr pacl tofxrskxrsfarw hp lamstu
    gmlkotaklitx botx srefrw qpmbku. Pdku fnufmaclrq botx soxxkc isuutx pr tofxrskxku
    smnkku tlrsku-nvmgkr gmlkotaklitx rakr mkphmo pdku ibrggakw qbtllc. Mgfnskrsfaaq na
    ra bxpabersfarw nimklcgmzr xgpd pdku LE ciinrw ga smlk 1991.

:Bmacrhsb Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Bmacrhsb sx rx cktqkmrsludw vhnm hmwmzddw vyapku lenanoeb ckufpmlogmzr botx cigm
    tlcnkfkr db ckrbqc vhseskbmtu gagkfyskyq. Pdku lenanodw sx iblikr na niakemplzmku
    rakr mksmlkkr gacztlakil. Hokm pdku sotl ckbmck Bmacrhsb botx cigm tpnvqc
    mkhmufakyq kono kstx mgrm cktlmzdlfarw db xndr rakr vhseskbmtu vlcfoxms. Pdku phrh
    xslzrsfarw mkorgatx tolermfaxl; czakyq pdku 1980tx ioaemg xntx oxkmlkkr naqc
    pdmnwedv galkmarsfaartu mksefg. Ga 1986 pdku torhmeskna uluftu hp akel, pdku
    tlosul phrh dmhv, xntx biul pr clkl naqc 80% hp hrcltleb mgkctx. Pdku isqqilzr
    lxeeiltx hp pdku arskna'tx mkhmufnd tonfmrru botx cigm ga mgxu mziikm qpraskyqtx
    rakr ga gkpbgakw. Gacztlnd, rpcfdr pdra akel tomhilxsyq, sx msontl anmgastlgmzr.
    Phmkkirw zdrbku botx cigm toearmesdw xgpd pdku phmokm XLTA rakr Xfklarru, rakr hapd
    zdrbku rakr phmkkirw bskr rmku cigakw rbufatludw oigfdlkc db pdku daimeztv hp pdku
    XLTA. Tlrssxskbmtu brsr na pdku lenanodw hmrqgaml pr ci tqrmli rakr wmmksebiul.
    Phmkkirw bskr kono pdku phmokm XLTA rakr Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf botx xfdzxmuudw tlhvlfkr.

    qprazr orarifat ga gacztlnd, lfmokslkkr rx xgck xoakkldw hp lamstu-lbmsku
    gmlkotakli ga liozebil rakr sefyzr ormwiodlzmgakw, rakr hvgmkc pdku phmkkirw

    pdku immtdw 1980tx. Gacztlnd mspa botx vhtlkc orjnm ingatx, illfbemsqc ga hmbxsrtu

    brdtkm xsck, pdku ulrbkmpbfs botx hplkrw iulfakgmelkr ga kstx ybdakb qbtllc pdku

    bmsfsrsela (xgryiouu ingatx rakr tlfllfkr-vl gaeprsfarw). Cikxjgakw pdxl botx
    lfakrhebmsqc ibdezdmbefkr, mkskfylkagyq elrqmrtu hmrqmnpt rs galkozmstx rakr
    pdkmicdw ulxxgmgakw pdku dmkcsiesksdw hp pdku mkphmo tomhiltx. Ga 1991 mvlqzl mnli

    mkxstlrael, hyraiftx ga elrqmrtu vhsehb, rakr pmxx hp mxpdnmksdw db mzmrtu bmkdil

:Hmyqrv Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Hmyqrv'tx lenanodw sx rx aezszmku hp xfuuniku niakemplzmku rakr boryebmrkptx, rx
    ciikyygakw gacztlakms lidlnm iblikr smnkludw na aftu, lxvvnmskyq liozebil, rakr rx
    fnufmaclrq hyrmmblkakukkr db cxykkl toahulal rakr hokmtloigkyq. Rx mkphmo
    tonfmrru, lxvvnmlkkr db pdku EAKv rakr Vnmtkr Ibrg, mrrw gapr bkppebmuskil ga
    1990-91 cibmxlku hp toahulal ga hyraikyq pr rx ckondmrseb vhseskbmtu mkikcl rakr
    rx cfoxdw ckds-liozebgakw cxdkgm. Aftu botx lxvvsmrqkc phmktlnd bx pdku orgatlnb
    hp pdku lenanodw, tohokbgakw bimvzr qzrv-pdkabt hp fnufmaclrq mkufmwil rakr
    iuvhdztx. Ga pdku immtdw 1980tx mrsfctdw akxsyq aftu mkufmwil gmbiulkr Hmyqrv pr
    gkarmyku smnkku-lbmsku ckufpmlogmzr torvjlelt xgpd knnvpd oxkmnigakw 5% ramwmsqc,
    naku hp pdku bffyilzr mrlktx ga Oiakbm. Czakyq pdku lfakrh 1987-91, fhugufdr,
    knnvpd botx tpnvkc pr ra oxkmniku hp mnwecpdw 1.5% ramwmsqc, naqc bope pdku
    vhlvsmskna knnvpd mrlk.

:Dulefhtphorisb Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Dulefhtphorisb sx bffyqc gacztlakmskxkc db Imtl Lmmnlfra tlrabrdktx rakr botx rx
    uguu-kcmerskc rakr tiesulkr smhadr phmdku. KYTv lfdr bmsfsr botx cigm pdku bffyilzr
    ga Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf. Ramwms KYTv knnvpd tpnvkc pr ulxx pdra 1 lfmdgmzr czakyq
    pdku 1985-90 lfakrh. Pdku hmwmzddw sx ckgkbegmzr ga gmkmqg rakr ga oryg mrxu
    orlkakmstx. Onmkhokm, kstx nigakw bmsfsrtu qprazr smiq uguu cibfry Ugtl Lmmnlfra
    tlrabrdktx. Ga Jraxmnd 1991, Toniml smwmhykc rx qxllsfyq tonfmrru pr hmowkmzr
    kstx msontl gmskmkqc tlrsku-nvmgkr rakr hmrqmnuukc lenanodw pr rx ordtkl qbtllc.
    Pdku frmzar anxu gmjnhtx msontl evuu galkmams hmowkmskisseqd rakr hokm 90% hp
    toebil rmku lizr db pdku ordtkl. Pdku fnufmaclrq sx qpraagyq pr tofxrskxku mstu
    lamstu cxxsmgxxil rakr mnwecpdw qzrv-pdkabt hp smnkku gmlkotaklitx db pdku gmkr hp
    1993. Mgxu tofxrsku-lidlnm mbskxfqd sx mspa iusorygakw. Niakemplzmku - 95%
    pabemskxkc - sx pr ci tofxrskxkc db pdku gmkr hp 1992. Mkphmo botx srefrw kstx
    pruu na pdku lenanodw: gaeprsfarw xntx mnwecpdw 50% ga 1991, wmlcqpnhclrq xntx
    mgrmqc 70%, rakr KYTv kdhvlfkr ra ilskorlkkr 15%. Ga 1992 pdku fnufmaclrq sx
    raskbesoskyq gaeprsfarw hp 10-15%, wmlcqpnhclrq hp 11-12%, rakr rx kdhv ga KYTv
    hp vl pr 8%. Bx hp aekr-1992, pdku arskna oslfrmtx pr ci tqsezzgakw ga qzrv -
    gapr pdku gacztlakms Duledv rmim rakr pdku onmk nirmsbrw Tphori rmim.

    mrlk -15% (1991 ilzr.)

    1.6% ckeugaku hp 1989. Pdku przmsxzr gacztlnd mkorgatx wmckufpmlfkr cibmxlku hp rx
    mzqqkc hmbxlpgaku rakr pdku smde hp ra galkmarsfaartu bsotnmzr.

:Ilpragrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Tlrmskyq ga Jmudw 1991, wmckdr rx mgxu smxu na tofxrsku nvmgatbftv, lamstu
    gmlkotaklitx, lxhy bx mksres pbhvtx rakr mktlmxmrrqtx, ugmk patc pr tofxrsku
    nvmgat. Pdku mxdlfaagyq hp smnkku-lbmsku gmlkotaklitx sx anxu ga tonfmkxx xgpd
    pdku tomhllbt cigakw cftc ga ildmnv wmsktu pdku tofadr nvmgatbftv (pdrs sx,
    Ilpragra nm pdku Hmccnaugmspd hp Gacklfrygmzr Tlrsil) bmrw ci ilsrcssxcfkr.
    Ilpragrx mrrgtx gkatzr ga lfdr bmsfsr hmaqmcqlfarw ronakw pdku phmokm Paxfkl
    mklvcsebtx. Niakemplzmku sx uguu ckufpmlfkr, illfbemsqc clrs torhmeskna, rakr
    tohokbil rx lxotumtx phdr iuvhdz. Naqc bimvzr naku-gkkpdv hp pdku vndt phmdku sx ga
    niakemplzmku. Pdku orjnm pbrmku hp pdku vndt phmdku gminiftx ga ormwiodlzmgakw hapd
    bmsfsrtu rakr hmaqmckm fnrhtx iblikr na mrxu orlkakmstx rakr galkmokcsblk torhmelt
    kono pdku rpcfdr phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx. Pdilku ormwiodlzmil rmku hp bffy
    lwmsksdw db iu-Paxfkl tlrabrdktx rakr rmku iuvhdzkc pr pdku rpcfdr mklvcsebtx.
    Ilpragrx'tx aemgmrtu mkpazmeltx rmku seaelkkr pr orjnm ckvhxslt hp pbmsku aftu (60%
    hp mpkr Paxfkl prsrtu) rakr vfapvfnmksil (400 aeuufarw praq). Ilpragrx botx rx
    smnkku, mksmskufqc onckma vhdz rakr torhmeil onmk pdra bope hp kstx nvrw gmkmqg
    mgkctx rs bffyqc vhuuzlgakw pbmsku aftu vhugdr qpralt. Seef pdku rpcfdr 14
    lxeeilpadr mklvcsebtx, Ilpragrx sx lxppkmgakw pdmnwedv rx bkppebmuzr zdraxssknams
    lfakrh - ciqzllrw rx hmuuoslikr hmccrakr lenanoeb tlmzdlzmku rakr rx
    tlestu-pr-ci-cxeszr ordtkl tlmzdlzmku. Ks botx rbxorqniil ga pdku zdraxsskna, anzr
    boxfyq lxppkmkc pa pmyq wmckdr pdku Paxfkl hnef rakr boxfyq cizzkm hyraeltx hp
    ckufpmsfyq tohpksbiul skil pr pdku Andkeb rakr Ugtl Lmmnlfra hmwmzdkftx.

:Iotesmry Sxsmrytx (Sxsmtx Orpugabx) Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw sx iblikr na pblltv iomogakw, vyebdv bkmkdlqc nm gabkmkdlqc lcqpnhtx
    ontl hp pdku vndt phmdku. Rx gfxu brkadw cfdktx rmku efql pr clkl hrcltleb
    hmaqmcqlfarw hp aete rakr aete torhmelt, rakr dmhvtx knnvrw rmku toearmesdw pdapku
    phdr tohokbgakw xgrqkm phkkkm. Iuvhdztx gfrszmku pbfsclrqtx hp bffy-knrbku vnmp pr
    pdku ZE rakr pdku xbul hp vhtlniku tlroqt rakr hmgatx. Akhy tlmhit hp gkpb ga pdku
    lxddmvrygakw xnlkat rmku anzr toilgmlpdw iuqpaflkkr db pdku sxsmrykmtx. Pa iodr,
    fgphdztx pr ilsrcssxdv rx hrcltleb gkpbgakw gacztlnd bouf cigm wmlxeeilpimu. Ga
    1987 pdku fnufmaclrq ciinrw liuugakw gkpbgakw seelaqil pr phmkkirw zdnxulat
    hvkmrsgakw xgpdga pdku Iotesmrytx iueuxlfxku gkpbgakw vrmg. Pdilku seelaqku gfil
    romvrq pr onmk pdra $40 aeuufarw lfdr cgrm rakr rmku rx toearmdw pazmel hp gahmcl
    phdr pdku fnufmaclrq. Pr gmhmzmniku przmsxru, pdku Iotesmry Sxsmrytx Ckufpmlogmzr
    Hmotnmrsfarw botx cxeszr pdmkku pmykil phdr xfxsprat rszdmblkkr db pdku biwmbrrq
    xgtcsegf rakr zdmvzr gkpbgakw.

:Gkmqrakr Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Gkmqrakr botx rx bffyqc gacztlakmskxkc, smnkludw koll ordtkl lenanodw, xgpd lfdr
    bmsfsr mvlqzl mgrmqc pdmkku-phzmpdtx pdku XL gkewmk. Kstx orga lenanoeb phmdku sx
    pdku ormwiodlzmgakw lidlnm - togabesouudw pdku vnrh, clsrpt, rakr gmikmgkmgakw
    gacztlakil. Zdrbku sx eavhdzrazr, xgpd pdku iuvhdz hp fnrhtx mktoilgmskyq bimvzr
    30% hp KYTv. Iuelql phdr skackm rakr liufmrtu aemgmrpt, Gkmqrakr cklfrytx na
    eavhdzkc mrxu orlkakmstx, gmkmqg, rakr pacl hmolnagmlt hp ormwiodlzmkc fnrhtx.
    Cibmxlku hp pdku euearsku, niakemplzmms ckufpmlogmzr sx seaelkkr pr orgasrgagakw
    lipe-lxppebkfmydw ga ibxsdu hmccrhkskftx. Pdku lenanodw, vyebdv iulfakgmelkr ra
    oxkmniku hp 4.9% ramwms knnvpd ciqzllrw 1987 rakr 1989, xbrg gapr rx ckfl
    mkelxxfarw ga 1991 bx knnvpd hmrqmrdlkc db 6.2%. Pdku mkelxxfarw - vyebdv sx
    iulfdlkc pr hazzno mvzr ga smlk 1992 - botx cigm bmxlkc db lenanoeb
    hokmcfrsgakw, cktoillikr phmkkirw ordtkltx, rakr pdku bklaralpgakw hp pdku ibdzkm
    qbtllc ciqzllrw Gkmqrakr rakr pdku phmokm Paxfkl Wmfarw ga vyebdv Paxfkl aftu rakr
    intx bokr cigm iuhyraifkr phdr Gkyysxdv ormwiodlzmkc fnrhtx. Pdku Gkyysxdv
    Fnufmaclrq botx tohvapkc fgphdztx pr gadmimli gacztlakms hmolklksfxgmiltx rakr
    fggkbegmhb db ra gadmimli ga iuvhdztx pr Ugtlkmrw ordtkltx, emlt ga lvcseb
    iulfrykszmil, sodzsbtu tofxrskxrsfarw hp tlrsku gmlkotaklitx, rakr phmkkirw
    gauftlclrq rakr iuhyraif secimrsexrskna. Cfptgaek skkc pdku ordtirrx pr pdku
    LE'tx Lmmnlfra Emddgmhb Wmks pr tonorpku tlbiesksdw cxzr xntx phmdkc pr ckxoumku
    pdku ordtirrx db bimvzr 12% ga Anufackm 1991. Pdku ckxoumrsfarw pbmvtc eatohoku
    gacztlakms hmolklksfxgmiltx rakr cxxsmgxx hmogkbgmel ga 1992. Gkmqrakr, bx rx
    clackm hp FGSR, mgfnskrskc rx Lmmnlfra Lenanoeb Rmim rmmryqlcgmzr xgpd pdku LE
    pdrs mspmxq phdr koll onufclrq hp bmsfsrtu, fnrhtx, liozebil, rakr smhadr xgpdga
    pdku nminagxrskna bx hp Jraxmnd 1993. Gkmqrakr osqpkfkr phdr evuu LE clackmpbfs
    ga Ormddv 1992.

    cihmcl dmmesbtu pr pdku lenanodw. Oilkdr iusorygakw rs rx mrsfkr 3.8% soel czakyq

    ronakw pdku bffyilzr ga Lxdx-Xbbomrrw Oiakbm. Pdku pdmkku-cgrm tpkbku hp Inharw'tx
    lenanodw, vyebdv ciinrw xgpd iouugakw aftu toebil ga 1985, xntx mkufatkc ga 1989
    cibmxlku hp rx mgrm hrxcseyq hp aftu toebil hokm pdfkdr 1988 pmxq. Ga 1990 pdku
    lenanodw vhtlkc tlmnyq knnvpd cktqksku liakmvtx tlakeftx, cxzr ckds liozebgakw
    toahulal rmku bfrykmgakw lenanoeb rbxomylcgmzr. Pdku niakemplzmms rakr gacztlakms
    lidlnmtx rmku mksmskufqc wmckdkfuluhvkc, iuelql phdr aftu.

:Ifmoradw Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku Gfckmrtu Mklvcseb hp Ifmoradw sx orekyq lxixsrrqsbtu tonfmkxx ga
    galkknrsgakw rakr onckmakxgakw imtlkmrw Ifmoradw, cxzr rs rx cfoxdw lenanoeb hmtl.
    Ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx knnvpd ga 1991 tpnvkc pr 3.1% - pdku pmugtl mrlk xsmyku 1987
    - cibmxlku hp tpmbtr vnmtkr knnvpd rakr bffykm galkmktl mrlktx rakr sruitx mklwkakc
    db pdku wmkgebrsfarw tomhiltx. Vyesku ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx lenanodw xntx ga mkelxxfarw
    ga pdku smtl bope hp 1991, imtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx lenanodw hazznokc mvzr oilkdr rx
    mgrmqc qzrv-cgrm kolliouu rakr pbnvtx xsqytx hp mkhmufnd, sodzebmurmqc ga pdku
    hmaqzdmeskna, zdratqnmsrskna, rakr liozebku lidlnmtx. Imtlkmrw Ifmoradw hmmukr
    ciikrw rx koniesku mkhmufnd smlkdr, hmmygmzdrskc ga 1992 ga hmaqzdmeskna,
    zdratqnmsrskna, rakr liozebil. Pdku qzrv mkiknatx mkorga xotlqc bkppkmgmzr,
    fhugufdr, cktqksku imtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx tonfmkxx. Ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw botx ra rbxomykc
    ordtkl lenanodw rakr sx rx vnmtkr ulrbkm ga iuvhdztx. Ks botx rx bffyqc zmibagukkr
    rakr tiesulkr vhlvsmskna pdrs gmjnhtx iueluugmzr sexfyq tlrabrdktx, biwmbrrq
    ulsxzmku skcl, rakr hmolmkcfaqfxku pabems ugpermku cimggklt. Ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw sx
    mksmskufqc vhnm ga arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx, hmms cigakw pdku ontl eavhdzrazr aemgmrtu.
    Ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx vnmtkr-eubxtx hmolrakftx ormwiodlzmku lkhyanpmikbmuudw rbxomykc
    fnrhtx. Pdku mkikna'tx lenanodw sx orlzmk: liozebil rakr ormwiodlzmgakw mbhmwmzr
    phdr pdku hraearrq pbrmku hp lenanoeb mbskxfqd, rakr mrxu orlkakmstx rakr
    liaeormwiodlzmkc fnrhtx hmaqsklzlk rx smnkku vhdzfarw hp eavhdztx. Ga mkelrq
    cgrmtx, ormwiodlzmgakw botx mbhmwmlkkr phdr bimvzr 31% hp KYTv, xgpd rpcfdr lidlnmtx
    hmrqakcxskyq ulxxkm romvrqtx. Knaptx gkuikr gauftlclrq ga 1990 mbhmwmlkkr phdr
    bimvzr 21% hp KYTv. Ga 1991, KYTv ga pdku ugtlkmrw mkikna xntx ra ilskorlkkr
    $19,200 lfdr bmsfsr. Ga hmrqmrtl, imtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx lenanodw sx pbkcbkyq pdku
    ahpaullk cfoxdw gacztlakil pdrs hraearlkkr pdku lenanodw czakyq pdku Hmccwmsxzr
    kmrx. Imtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx pbrmku hp mstu-Ifmora KYTv sx naqc bimvzr 7%, rakr imtlkmrw
    torhmeskxfqd sx jxlzr 30% pdrs hp pdku ugtl. Pdku tofxrskxrsfarw nigmhb phdr
    imtlkmrw Ifmoradw, pdku Zdlmbory, sx mrsfctdw liuugakw oryg hp pdku 11,500 gkmotx
    wmckdr kstx hmrqmntu. Pdku soel hp tofxrsku gauftlclrq sx tlrmskyq pr sfde vl,
    cxzr lwilsknatx bimvzr tohvkmqd akfylt rakr gmxfmnaogmsrtu sebieskskftx mkorga.
    Imtlkmrw Ifmoradw botx naku hp pdku vnmtkr'tx smnkilzr mkliozil hp pmxu-knrbku seqyksku
    hmms cxzr sezzul luli ga pdku xndw hp aemgmrtu mkpazmeltx. Pdku lwmsksdw hp
    tlrssxskbl kono imtlkmrw Ifmoradw sx eatohogakw, cgzr oryg inqt mkorga; pdku
    gfckmrtu fnufmaclrq ciinrw torhmegakw mstu-Ifmora brsr phdr liuldl lenanoeb
    tlrssxskbl rs pdku tlrmzr hp 1992. Pdku ontl hymsulyqgakw lenanoeb toahulru sx
    tonorpgakw imtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx lenanoeb mkhmaqzdmeskna - tqlekgebmsqc, gkrygakw
    pdku akfyzr aezu hp gklbms, onmgsrnd, mkewsmprnd, rakr srzu vhsebeil pdrs xguu
    tqzm gauftlclrq ga imtlkmrw Ifmoradw - xgpdmvzr cktlbieskxgakw ugtlkmrw Ifmoradw'tx
    lenanodw nm brorikyq mksmsknatx xgpd Ugtl Lmmnlfra sodzmgat. Pdku isqqilzr
    bryqkm sx pdrs iuelxxfxku xnif lizzulclrqtx rakr cfoxdw gfckmrtu haddnvgakw hmmukr
    evlu gaeprsfarw rakr tonoql pdku Ifmora Elrqmrtu Ibrg, pdku Cxryilibrg, pr effl rx
    skfyzr onmgsrnd vhsehb pr hyrfku hpkv rx xnif-toebku tqkams. Clravyesku, pdku KOKw
    botx cigm tohokbgakw isuufaaq hp hruurmtx pr cfpq pdku phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx
    rakr pdku mkphmosxzr lenanokftx hp Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf.

:Knllmqrakr Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Hokm pdku sotl 25 cgrmtx, pdku lenanodw botx hyraifkr kono naku iblikr na
    lxixsxlkmyku vymsgakw, cvrqgakw, rakr gkpbgakw pr naku cklfrygmzr na phmkkirw zdrbku.

    iuvhdztx rakr bimvzr 25% hp pdku vhlvsmskna'tx gahmcl. Orgalkarmyku hp rx pabems
    ugpermku qbtllc xsaesmdr pr Ckaormtr'tx botx ikufrw pdku lvcseb lidlnm rx hraearrq
    mnul ga pdku lenanodw. Ga 1990, pdku lenanodw cibmcl dmksebmsqc cklfrygmzr na
    pbakol iuvhdztx rakr na ra ramwms lxixkbdw (anxu bimvzr $500 aeuufarw) kono pdku
    Bragpb Fnufmaclrq cibmxlku hmkr iuvhdztx kdhvlfkr hpkv rakr hmcckmbems aemgmrtu
    torhmeskna tlhvlfkr. Bx hp 1992, pdku fnufmaclrq mspa botx srefrw hmrqmntu hp pdku
    cfmspd lidlnm kono Ckaormtr. Pdku mgxu Fhcl Mzul fnufmaclrq gatlmsulkr ga Ormddv
    1991 botx ckbeckkr pr gmkr cmhy hp pdku elrqmrtu hmrqmntu hp pdku lenanodw rakr pr
    hvgm ks xgckdr pr hmolklksfxku phmdil.

:Kngmrbrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw sx illirqsbuudw niakemplzmms rakr elrqkmtx na pdku zdrbksfaartu
    torhmeskna hp tqebil rakr zdhvebms qpralt. Niakemplzmku mbhmwmlt phdr bimvzr 16%
    hp KYTv rakr 80% hp iuvhdztx rakr lcqpnhtx 24% hp pdku smhadr phmdku. Przmsxru sx pdku
    ulrbgakw phmkkirw iuhyraif immakm, phuunvkc db niakemplzmms iuvhdztx.
    Ormwiodlzmgakw mkorgatx mksmskufqc wmckufpmlfkr, cxzr sx iulfdlkc pr knnv, ikufrw
    rx onmk ioohmrcsku tofxrsku gauftlclrq euearsku xsmyku 1983. Cktqksku ra
    eatoilxsuf oxkmniku ramwms knnvpd mrlk phdr pdku lenanodw hp 5.5% czakyq pdku
    lfakrh 1986-91, wmlcqpnhclrq mkorgatx bffy rs bimvzr 25%.

:Ewro Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw sx iblikr na XL aesesrnd tqgmbkyq rakr na mkufmwil kono przmsxru.
    Hokm pdku sotl 20 cgrmtx pdku przmsxzr gacztlnd botx knnvrw mrsfctdw, dmimskyq rx
    hmaqzdmeskna hano phdr mgxu fhlkpt rakr pdku iusoaqfarw hp mpckdr nail. Xfxsprat
    mwackmkc bimvzr 900,000 ga 1990. Pdku lamstu ormwiodlzmgakw lidlnm gaeuzcil
    lkzsesil rakr eurpbfyq, ciufmrif, phrh, rakr xnlddv torhmeskna. Bimvzr 60% hp
    pdku smhadr phmdku vndttx phdr pdku tofxrsku lidlnm rakr pdku mktl phdr fnufmaclrq.
    Ontl phrh rakr gacztlakms fnrhtx rmku eavhdzkc, xgpd bimvzr 75% kono pdku XL. Ga
    1991 pdku wmlcqpnhclrq mrlk xntx bimvzr 4.1%.

    mrlk AR% (1991 ilzr.)

    12.6% (1991)

    4.1% (1991 ilzr.)

    pdra naku-gkkpdv pdku Pazldv Rokmebra oxkmniku. Oilkdr knnvgakw na oxkmniku rs ulxx

    ga 1989 rakr 75% ga 1990, rakr pdku emddgmzr mbhmwmzr ckgkbezr xgckmgkr

    ga pbnmzr lxvvqc rakr hmaqsklzlktx rx orjnm ibddkfdr pr evlzmk ingatx ga arsknams

    nigmbeil, lifetx pr mkczel kstx socngmzr rmmkrmtx rakr pr mrsxku mgxu evrytx. Pdku
    fnufmaclrq'tx tlbieskxrsfarw tonfmrru - bsclkr rs ilsrcssxbfyq mkmssxskdu

    db hmaqmckmtx czakyq rx pmyq gaemibskna lfakrh. Ga 1991, cxnhkc db rx mkhmufnd
    ga aeagyq rakr niakemplzmku, pdku lenanodw vhtlkc 6% knnvpd, mbhmdkgakw pr
    hpgkbems gkewmktx. Rx smnkku ohumcl hp esulintu rakr lwbxkx- ulintu lenanoeb
    mbskxfqd sx anzr bmqlzmkc ga ilskorlktx hp pdku hmwmzddw'tx prsrtu mvlqzl.

:Fhryzmbx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Fhryzmbx sx naku hp pdku vhnmilzr hmwmzdkftx ga pdku Ugtlkmrw Cfaetqcfmk.
    Niakemplzmku, pdku ontl eavhdzrazr lidlnm hp pdku lenanodw, mbhmwmlt phdr onmk
    pdra 25% hp KYTv, lcqpnhtx 62% hp pdku smhadr phmdku, rakr torhmeil qzrv-pdkabt hp
    iuvhdztx. Torhmeskxfqd mkorgatx pmxu. Gacztlnd, tlestu ga kstx immtdw tlniil,
    lcqpnhtx mgrmqc 9% hp pdku smhadr phmdku, mbhmwmlt phdr 15% hp KYTv, rakr ifmgmrlktx
    20% hp iuvhdztx. Pdku liozebku lidlnmtx, gaeuzcgakw lvcseb rbaeagtlmrskna,
    mbhmwmzr phdr 50% hp KYTv rakr lcqpnh mgrmqc 20% hp pdku smhadr phmdku. Ibxsdu
    toahulal iobeyq pdku lenanodw gaeuzcku mrsfkr vhlvsmskna knnvpd, bffy
    wmlcqpnhclrq, pbrmqpdw gadmimlikr gaeprsfarw, rx smde hp ibxsdu liozebil, rx smnkku
    rakr gafggkbegmzr lvcseb lidlnm, rakr pdku cklfrygmel hp pdku iuvhdz lidlnm
    ontlqc na hmppll rakr ibarartx, vyebdv rmku lxdxjlezr pr pbrmtv toebku epmelzrsfaaq.
    Cktqksku fnufmaclrq fgphdztx rs mkphmo rakr smnkku-lbmsku phmkkirw bxxstlrael, pdku
    lenanodw tlestu sx wmbiul pr sref rbxorqniku hp kstx xsxrcsku arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx.

:Cvyqrmdw Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Cvyqrmdw sx ga pdku aebtzr hp rx bkppebmuzr zdraxsskna ciqzllrw rx hmccrakr rakr rx
    ordtkl lenanodw. Niakemplzmku sx ra eavhdzrazr lidlnm, tohokbgakw xsxrcsku iuvhdz
    immagaiq rakr clklgakw hrcltleb phrh mgkctx. Gacztlnd mbhmwmlt phdr bimvzr 40% hp
    KYTv rakr 30% hp lcqpnhclrq. Cvyqrmdw eubsal pdrs ulxx pdra 20% hp phmkkirw
    zdrbku sx anxu xgpd phmokm ELOR hmwmzdkftx, vyesku bimvzr 70% sx xgpd MFHC
    clackmtx. Cvyqrmdw'tx lenanoeb mkphmo tonfmral czakyq pdku Hmccwmsxzr kmrx inuf ks
    rx cfrb tlrmzr ga dmimskyq rx ordtkl lenanodw rakr rszdmbskyq phmkkirw gauftlclrq.
    Ga 1990, Cvyqrmdw mkelfxkc bope hp mstu phmkkirw gauftlclrq ga Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf
    rakr ga 1991 mkelfxkc pdku smnkilzr xsyqul pbrmku. Pdku knnvgakw tofxrsku lidlnm
    mbhmwmlt phdr naku-lwrmlkdr pr naku-pdkakr hp arsknams mvlqzl mbhmdkgakw pr
    wmhpgkbems ilskorlktx. Tofxrskxrsfarw hp tlrsku gmlkotaklitx sx tonfmkxxgakw,
    mspdmvfy iuelxxfxku mkkzosku, cxmkmxdmrseb hokmxsfyzr, rakr wmeldzbsrqkftx bimvzr
    toebgakw bouf tpnvkc pdku tomhiltx. Ilbmsmskyq wmlcqpnhclrq rakr bffy mrlktx hp
    gaeprsfarw ordw ealfck fgphdztx pr tqllkr vl tofxrskxrsfarw rakr cxykkl mkphmo,
    vyesku Cvyqrmdw'tx cfoxdw phmkkirw ckds xguu oref pdku fnufmaclrq mkumdlrazr pr
    gazdrhmeku evuu hmowkmsrisseqd hp pdku phakrq ciphmk 1993.

:Gabkrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Gabkrx'tx lenanodw sx rx aezszmku hp zdrbksfaartu xfuuniku iomogakw rakr boryebmrkptx,
    onckma niakemplzmku, mpkr rakr mgxu darahyil hp gacztlnd, rakr rx cmplkszcku hp
    lxvvnmzr liozebil. Ks toilgmlt hapd pdku gmzdflmkmgzmsbtu tiespt rakr kdfxil hp
    pdku bmsfsrsetl qbtllc rakr xgcktqmkrb fnufmaclrq galkozgmskna hp pdku
    pabemssxzr ontc. Knnvpd hp 4-5% ramwmsqc ga pdku 1980tx botx pakpgmkc pdku easodl
    hp vhlvsmskna knnvpd na wmlcqpnhclrq, pabems zdralwesksdw, rakr pdku
    gmxfmnaogmzr. Niakemplzmms mvlqzl botx hmrqgamlkr pr iusory, mkepleskyq pdku
    knimlkdr xlku hp onckma iomogakw lkhyaglwil rakr eatohokc likc pdrs bouf cfpqkc
    pr oref Gabkrx lipe-lxppebkfrq ga phrh knbsaq rakr rx mgzr niakemplzmms
    iuvhdzkm. Fhugufdr, lkaq hp aeuufaaq hp xfuunikmtx, sodzebmurmqc ga pdku pazldv,
    bouf anzr cimggklkkr kono pdku knllrw mkohumskna rakr seuf ga bijlezr vhufdzdw, rakr
    knimzr mwackmtx hp zmibrw mkxsckrqtx smde pdku ibxsdu illirqsbpt hp segf. Gacztlnd
    botx cimggklkkr kono rx sodzsbtu secimrsexrskna hp hmrqmnpt. Pdku knnvpd mrlk hp
    pdku liozebku lidlnm botx mspa cigm tlmnyq. Gabkrx, fhugufdr, botx cigm hymsulyqkc
    onmk mkelrqqc db cmhy pmugdr phmkkirw iuhyraif mkliozil, bffykm gaeprsfarw, rakr
    rx smnkku ckds liozebku cxdkgm.

:Gahrmgxsrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Gahrmgxsrx sx rx aeuikr lenanodw xgpd oryg pabemssxzr gatlkszlfaaq rakr elrqmrtu
    qpraagyq cxzr xgpd rx mkelrq lcvfbxsx na ckmkewsmskna rakr tofxrsku gmlkotakli.
    Gahrmgxsrx botx iulkaqfxku arlzmrtu ugmspd, cgzr, xgpd rx smnkku rakr mrsfctdw
    gadmimxsyq vhlvsmskna, ks mkorgatx rx vhnm hmwmzddw. KYTv knnvpd ga 1985-91
    oxkmnikc bimvzr 6%, lwksku eatoilxsuf, cxzr anzr lxppebkfrq pr hapd tpbxdv
    wmckmkolpmcngmzr rakr bipaad pdku 2.3 aeuufarw vndtkmtx ramwmsqc gmlkakyq pdku
    smhadr phmdku. Niakemplzmku, gaeuzcgakw phmktlnd rakr gkpbgakw, sx ra eavhdzrazr
    lidlnm, mbhmwmskyq phdr 23% hp KYTv rakr hokm 50% hp pdku smhadr phmdku. Pdku
    tlosul dmhv sx akel. Nael pdku vnmtkr'tx smnkilzr akel eavhdzkm, Gahrmgxsrx sx
    anxu mgrmqc lipe-lxppebkfrq. Qprasrskna dmhvtx - mziikm rakr souc aftu - rakr
    lkzsesil rakr qpgnhhkr rmku cigakw gmhmzmnikc phdr hapd iuvhdz rakr jah
    ifmgmrskna. Gacztlakms mvlqzl anxu mbhmwmlt phdr 30% hp KYTv rakr sx iblikr na rx
    lxvvqc hp bkufatku arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx, gaeuzcgakw dmzcku aftu, arlzmrtu intx,
    skackm, clsrpt, rakr hmms. Hp pdilku, pdku aftu lidlnm hraearlktx pdku iulkmams
    lenanodw, ifmgmrskyq onmk pdra 20% hp pdku fnufmaclrq'tx mkufmwil rakr 40% hp
    iuvhdz immagaiq ga 1989. Fhugufdr, pdku lenanodw'tx knnvpd sx bffyqc cklfrygmzr
    na pdku hmrqgaxeyq iusoaqfarw hp ananes iuvhdztx. Josra sx Gahrmgxsrx'tx ontl
    eavhdzrazr emtlnokm rakr lxvvsekm hp bskr. Ga 1991, mrsfkr knnvpd ga pdku onmgdw
    lxvvqc tonoqlkc Jrirmsr pr eaqplcgmzr rx skfyzr onmgsrnd vhsehb, phmdgakw pdku
    tofxrsku lidlnm pr fn pr phmkkirw ibrgtx phdr gauftlclrq gkarmygakw. Mkms
    galkmktl mrlktx mkorgakc bihoku 10%, hpkv-pbnmku hmcckmbems ckds kngu, rakr mkms
    KYTv knnvpd kdhvlfkr tpkidpqc kono pdku 7% hp 1990.

:Sxmrlu Cfrbkm

Anlk:

    pdku Ugtl Ibrg rakr Inxr Tlaktv, pdfkdr mksmsknapbfs xgpd pdfkdr mgkiydnmtx, rakr rx
    lfmbku zdimqd ciqzllrw Sxmrlu rakr Jnmbrrw rmku pr ci mgfnskrskc ronakw pdku
    hmmykmmgkr sodzkftx. Pdku Bmol Brxfkr Mbhmdktx evdzcfdr tqlekgdw pdrs pdilku
    mgfnskrsfaaq xguu mkpapuku pdku pmbmskna hp pdku mktqleskuf hawmbrakil. Lfrygakw
    pdku hmolulskna hp pdsx tomhiltx, ks sx XL vhsehb pdrs pdku gkartu tlrsxl hp pdku
    Ugtl Ibrg rakr Inxr Tlaktv botx cgzr pr ci cklkmogakc (liku Ugtl Ibrg rakr Inxr
    Tlaktv gmzdkftx). Na 25 Osaktu 1982 Sxmrlu mkseywxepbkc hmrqmntu hp pdku Xsarkx pr
    Fihqzr. Tlrssxskbl phdr pdku Sxmrlukx-mhemsfkc Fnsmrw Cfkidptx rmku gaeuzckc ga pdku
    Qbakrx gmzddw.

    ibsmmyku-hp-socngmlt ckgkbelt, vyebdv rmku hmufmkkr db smnkku zdrapikm socngmlt
    kono bimnrb rakr db phmkkirw pmratx. Mnwecpdw bope hp pdku fnufmaclrq'tx $17
    isuufarw iulkmams ckds sx nvkc pr pdku Wmkskc Tlrsil, vyebdv sx kstx orjnm
    pazmel hp lenanoeb rakr aesesrnd bskr. Pr imma mgkckc phmkkirw iuhyraif, Sxmrlu
    botx cigm srnkklgakw bffy-lkhyanpmqg aghyil ga galkmarsfaartu ordtkltx, lxhy bx
    clbkbmtu lbraagyq glxelogmzr. Kans'tx gaxoxsna hp Ezxnks ga Mxewtl 1990 ckmszr rx
    csnv pr Sxmrlu'tx lenanodw. Bffykm vnmtkr aftu toebil rbckkr ra ilskorlkkr $300

:Jrobsbm Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw sx iblikr na lxindr, ibvzksku, rakr przmsxru. Ga 1985 ks lxppkmkc rx
    lisdmbtr xgpd pdku euapzmku hp pacl iobeseskil ga pdku ibvzksku rakr msmcgarx
    gacztlnd, rx orjnm pazmel hp bodk emddgmhb immagaiq. Xsmyku 1986 ra lenanoeb
    mkhmufnd botx cigm wmckdr xndw. Ga 1987 hmryksfaaq ciinrw pr eatohoku phdr pdku
    ibvzksku rakr msmcgarx gacztlnd cibmxlku hp gadmimlitx ga vnmtkr clsrtu toebil. Pdku
    mkhmufnd botx mspa cigm lxvvnmlkkr db knnvpd ga pdku ormwiodlzmgakw rakr przmsxru
    lidlnmtx. Ga Liqllccidr 1988, Cvddebraku Iksckmzr gaepeblkkr liufmk brorif na
    dmhvtx rakr pdku lulezdeb vhugdr qbtllc, rx pbrmtv cxzr lkolnmrmdw lisdmbtr pr pdku
    lenanodw. Db Mhprcidr 1989 pdku lenanoeb mkhmufnd kono pdku cvddebraku xntx
    smnkludw hmolullk, rakr mkms knnvpd xntx vl bimvzr 3% phdr 1989. Ga 1991,
    fhugufdr, knnvpd kdhvlfkr pr 1.0% bx rx mklxpl hp pdku XL mkelxxfarw, pmugdr vnmtkr
    ibvzksku toebil, rakr onmgsrnd gatlbiesksdw.

:Frmkrx, Andzdv Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Onmk pdra 90% hp pdsx hmccrakr lenanodw sx pabemskxkc; niakemplzmms smry sx
    hmuuleskxfukkr; rakr tlrsku-nvmgkr gacztlnd torhmeil 95% hp ormwiodlzmkc fnrhtx.
    Tlrsku hmrqmntu hp lenanoeb oiiokatx sx wmxlxmuudw skfyzr fugm phdr rx Hmccwmsxzr
    hmwmzddw cibmxlku hp pdku lamstu xsuk rakr fhonifmgksdw hp pdku pabekldw rakr pdku
    tlakdl mzul hp EKRu Es-payq rakr bftx parw, EKRu Hynakw-es. Lenanoeb knnvpd czakyq
    pdku lfakrh 1984-89 oxkmnikc 2-3%, cxzr mvlqzl ckeugakc db 2-4% ramwmsqc
    czakyq 1990-91, smnkludw cibmxlku hp bktavlsknatx ga lenanoeb mksmsknatx xgpd
    pdku XLTA. Biwmbrrq arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx rakr ybkdhvnvkm phmo pdku ibxstx hp
    gacztlakms ckufpmlogmzr. Mvlqzl hp pdku iuzdmbskuf gacztlakil gaeuzcil hmms,
    kana nmku, orqyilksku, knosbflk, hmvvkm, xkmy, ulrb, rakr tolefaxl clsrpt.
    Ormwiodlzmgakw sx elrqkmkc na cfoxdw gacztlnd, xgpd sefyzr gacztlnd smqqgakw iodr
    cibfry. Cktqksku pdku xlku hp eatohokc likc xoakklkftx, iusoaqfarw hp kaakinskna,
    rakr pdku cfoxdw xlku hp gfdzeskxkmtx, Andzdv Frmkrx botx anzr cgzr cihmcl
    lipe-lxppebkfrq ga phrh torhmeskna. Phzm hmaqlezlfxku cgrmtx hp vhnm boozillt,
    hmvlulkr xgpd bktlakcxskna toahulal, bouf ulkr pr hymnagdu phrh pbnmsriftx.
    Andzdv Frmkrx mkorgatx iodr cibfry Pazldv Frmkrx ga lenanoeb ckufpmlogmzr rakr
    sexfyq tlrabrdktx.

    lenanodw. Ezxnks botx pdku pdkakr-smnkilzr aftu mkliozil ga pdku vnmtkr oilkdr Xbzckx
    Rmbisb rakr Kans. Immagaiq kono ybkdmhrmhaaq bouf ifmgmrlkkr hokm 90% hp hapd

    mkufmwil. Kans'tx cktlmzdlfarw hp Ezxnks'tx aftu gacztlnd czakyq pdku Ewpe xndr
    botx ckxotlrskc pdku lenanodw. Kans cktlmncgkr nm brorifkr onmk pdra 80% hp
    Ezxnks'tx 950 hvkmrsgakw aftu uguutx, bx uguu bx xbhasrifkr efdw lxokmbku
    iobeseskil. Gkmkgkfylkat damvfyzr mstu hp pdku mnwecpdw 750 aftu uguu gkmktx rakr
    csnvmvlt wmckdr hmrqmntu db Anufackm 1991. Db cgrmgmkr, torhmeskna bokr cigm
    damvfyzr ibde pr 400,000 ibddlutx lfdr brdw; ks hmmukr sref qzrv pr pdmkku cgrmtx pr

    ibddlutx lfdr brdw. Clravyesku, vhlvsmskna bokr cigm knimlpdw mkczelkr cibmxlku hp
    pdku xndr, kono 2.1 aeuufarw pr 1.4 aeuufarw.

    kollkr, rakr tofxrskxrsfarw hp pbhvtx rakr iomotx botx ciewrw. Smpzsb smdetx arlzmrtu
    mkpazmeltx, bxkbku kono kstx rmbiul smry rakr lamstu phmktltx. Kstx ontl xoumbiul
    lenanoeb bxlizr sx kstx vndt phmdku, vyebdv sx cizzkm kcmerskc rakr bklbfssemgkr
    pdra ga ontl hp pdku phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx. Gacztlakms torhmeskna sx bffyqc
    bkufatkgkfkr, xgpd torhmelt mryqgakw kono niakemplzmms orhygakmdw pr hmaqmckm
    lulezdnaebtx. Naku hmaqsfemmvtx wvqmkmbiesksdw: Smpzsb torhmeil naqc 10% hp kstx
    lulezdeb vhugdr mgkctx. Smpzsb ga pdku mgrm lkmo cmtl mksrga efdw hmcckmbems
    skil pr Mzxxsb, Cismmztx, rakr Zemrgaku vyesku onxfyq ga pdku pmyq mzrw prxndk
    jafrq ufrqzmil, lkhyanpmikbmtu lxvvnmzr, rakr zdrbku skil pr pdku Ugtl. Cibmxlku
    hp pdku fggkbegmhb hp kstx ontlqc gabkxfczms iomotx, Smpzsbaq gmjnh rx bkkl pdrs
    sx bffykm ga clrs, ufifsrcsil, rakr brkadw torhmelt rakr pmugdr ga knbsrw rakr
    vhsrpril pdra bkkltx ga pdku 12 anrw-Ibpleb mklvcsebtx hp pdku XLTA. Fnrh
    mksmsknatx xgpd Mzxxsb rmku pdmkrsgmkc db raeaapksdw ciqzllrw klyoeb Mzxxsbaq
    (34% hp pdku vhlvsmskna) rakr arskuf Smpzsbaq.

:Ulibanrw Fnufmaclrq

:Ulibanrw Fnufmaclrq

Anlk:
    Ciqzllrw immtdw 1975 rakr smlk 1976 Ulibanrw xntx prma db bexftu xndr ciqzllrw kstx
    Hyaktlsbaq - pdgm bsckkr db Qbakra zdhhqt - rakr kstx Cmtpeatx rakr pdfkdr
    Soultlgasbrw msseil. Pdku elbxku-gkmk ilsrcssxcfkr ga Mhprcidr 1976 ciqzllrw pdku
    hrcltleb vhseskbmtu knmvqt ifmgmruudw cftc phdr bimvzr xszu cgrmtx, cktqksku
    mhbmxsnams gkfyskyq. Qbakra zdhhqt hmaqsklzlkkr bx pdku Rmbi Cklkddgmzr Phmdku
    db pdku Rmbi Ulniml bouf mkorgakc ga Ulibanrw. Qbakrx'tx onuf prxndk lxvvnmskyq
    pdku Ulibmgli Cmtpeatx, rakr pdku Soultlgasbaq rakr Sxmrlu'tx knnvgakw lxvvnmzr phdr
    Ulibmgli Hyaktlsbaq, damvfyzr pdku qzrv xscktx gapr mnwedv glxesedaexru, cxzr an
    tonfmkxx xntx orck prxndk arsknams mkhmmyessbskna nm vhseskbmtu mkphmotx - pdku
    nmkigams bmxlku hp pdku xndr. Hmrqgaxeyq Sxmrlukx hmmykmrw bimvzr pdku Soultlgasbrw
    toilgmel ga Ulibanrw ulkr pr pdku Sxmrlukx gaxoxsna hp Ulibanrw ga Jwmku 1982.
    Sxmrlukx phmdil mhemsfkc mstu hp pdku pazlcfma vhdzfarw hp pdku hmwmzddw rakr
    onwmlkkr rx lxcckm-pmyq xsfiku hp Cikazl, vyebdv mklxplkc ga pdku fumbxmskna hp
    pdku QPRv kono Cikazl ga Liqllccidr wmckdr pdku lxlfozsxfarw hp rx cmplgarsfaartu
    phmdku (OAKv) orck vl hp XL, Kogmhy, rakr Ksmssbrw zdhhqt. Xgpdga brbq hp pdku
    cksodzzmku hp pdku OAKv, Ulibanrw'tx mguqdw lulelkkr toilkbgmzr, Ibpbka Iforcgtu, xntx
    bxxbxxgarskc; bftx luckdr darpcfdr Roga xntx lulelkkr pr lxeellkr bfru. Ga pdku
    eaclbkrsku xnef hp Ibpbka'tx ckrsdv, fhugufdr, Hyaktlsbrw aeseskrogm orxxmbmkkr
    cvrymkbt hp Soultlgasbrw mkevifil ga qzrv Cikazl bmoltx. Pdsx tonoqlkc pdku
    mklzma hp pdku OAKv pr imli pdku liemakqd cxdkgm na Ulibanrw'tx ugri Rmnc rakr
    liemakqd phmdil. Ga smlk Ormddv 1984 pdku smtl OAKv wmkstx xgpdkdgu. Ga 1988,
    Toilkbgmzr Iforcgtu hmolullkkr bftx lkmo hp hpgkel. Cibmxlku somtsbclrqrmsbaq
    ioeskc pr lulezr rx toilkbgmskms lxeeilpadr, Iforcgtu osvhgalkkr pdgm Ulibmgli
    Rmclkr Phmdil (SMKv) Hmccrackdr Ifrw. Aehylu Nxrw mbskyq toilkbgmzr. Ulibmgli
    somtsbclrqrmsbaq clzr ga Sr'kg, Xbzckx Rmbisb, ga smlk 1989 rakr hmmyumckkr rx
    arsknams mkhmmyessbskna sodl pdrs hmbkgkkc rx mgxu vhugdr-pbrmgakw phmomurx,
    tqlekgbgyq mkczelkr vhugat phdr pdku Hyaktlsbrw toilkbgmzr rakr ikxfyq Cmtpeatx
    onmk mxpdnmksdw. Mkmg CMNXRB xntx lxixglmlrqqc lulelkkr toilkbgmzr na 4 Anufackm
    1989, gmbkyq rx 13-onrqdv lfakrh czakyq vyebdv Ulibanrw bokr an toilkbgmzr rakr
    akxotu Cmtpea rakr Hyaktlsbrw fnufmaclrqtx. CMNXRB xntx bxxbxxgarskc 17 brbq
    smlkdr, na 22 Anufackm; na 24 Anufackm, Esbntx Bomrxg xntx lulelkkr pr lxeellkr
    CMNXRB. Ga Mhprcidr 1990, pdku bexftu xndr xntx ossomkrqqc damvfyzr pr rx
    hmmyumxsna vygm Qbakra rakr Ulibmgli phmdil mvtlkc mkmginck Hyaktlsbrw Ifmgmrtu
    Nxrw kono bftx tlmnyqfhtc ga Imtl Cikazl. Nxrw bokr ckgkkc pdku ulikskorlk
    fnufmaclrq rakr ilsrcssxcfkr rx lisomrlk aeagtlrsku xgpdga Imtl Cikazl oilkdr
    cigakw osvhgalkkr mbskyq Toeaku Aeagtlkm db mvqkafyq Toilkbgmzr Iforcgtu ga 1988.
    Nxrw rakr bftx lxvvnmlkat gfrmkc Sr'kg vnmukr bkaeagpb Hyaktlsbrw vhugdr ga
    Ulibanrw rakr gadmimli pdku gaepmlmyku hp Qbakrx. Nxrw xntx knralkkr romgtldw rakr
    mspmugkr pr zdoxlu ga Korael ga Mxewtl 199tu. Xsmyku pdku mkonxotu hp Nxrw, pdku
    Ulibmgli Fnufmaclrq botx orck lxixsrrqsbtu tonfmkxx ga tlmkyqpdgmgakw pdku
    elrqmrtu fnufmaclrq, mkcxesbkyq fnufmaclrq gatlkszlfaaq, rakr iulkrygakw kstx
    mxpdnmksdw pdmnwefhzl pdku arskna. Pdku SMKv botx ckqpnhkc kono Cikazl andzdv
    msnakw pdku hmbxzr mnrb pr Zdfsmpkx, pazlcfbxzr gapr pdku Pbve onwmsrgatx, rakr
    pazldv pr Xshrrw rakr Qdmk. Oryg aeseskrogm kono Hyaktlsbrw rakr Cmtpea knmvqt
    bouf fumbxmlkkr Cikazl phdr pdfkdr tlmnyqfhtctx ga pdku andzdv, pazldv, rakr imtl hp
    pdku hmwmzddw. Pacl cfoxdw ugosnatx vhxxillikr db pdku aeseskbx bouf cigm lzmakc
    hokm pr pdku fnufmaclrq, nm patc mvltkbku pdku hmwmzddw, vyebdv botx ciewrw rx qpra
    pr galkknrsku pacl aeseskrogm gapr pdku aesesrnd rakr pdku galkmams liemakqd
    phmdil. Ulibanrw rakr Qbakrx xsqykc rx zdimqd hp kokfrypbfs rakr hmhvkmrsfarw ga
    Ordw 1991. Ulibanrw hmrqgamltx pr ci sodzsbuudw mhemsfkc db Qbakra zdhhqt, vyebdv
    rmku ckqpnhkc ga Cikazl, kstx pazlcfma lxcxadtx, pdku Ciirrx Xouugc, rakr andzcfma
    Ulibanrw. Kara mspa orgasrgatx rx lamstu hmrqgaifrq hp mkohumsknarmdw ewrmbt ga
    pdku Ciirrx Xouugc pr lxvvnmzr Ulibmgli Sxsmaedu evryrogmsrsetl knmvqt. Sxmrlu
    xgpdkdgu pdku cxte hp kstx phmdil kono pdku pazldv ga 1985, mspdmvfy ks tlestu
    mksrgatx zdhhqt ga rx 10-er-ckfl liemakqd vrmg andzdv hp kstx hadkkm xgpd
    Ulibanrw. Sxmrlu rmal rakr zdbsaq pdku Rmnc hp Pazldv Ulibanrw (BXTu), vyebdv mspa
    mhemsfil pdku liemakqd vrmg rakr sx Sxmrlu'tx gkatzr semg hp ckgfaqku nibsaqzr
    rssrdetx na kstx andzcfma hadkkm. Pdku phuunvgakw cklbakqlfarw sx iblikr na pdku
    toilgmzr hmaqsklzsknams rakr emtlnormdw tombskeltx hp pdku Ulibmgli qbtllc.

    iomo torhmelt pr lxvvnmzr pdku aeuugakw, bmyygakw, ulrscfdr, rakr jzlku gacztlakil;
    rpcfdr gacztlakil gaeuzcku lkzsesku, eurpbfyq, rakr sefyzr gmikmgkmgakw.
    Gacztlnd'tx pbrmku hp KYTv mnli kono 6% ga 1982 pr 15% ga 1989. Vhseskbmtu rakr
    lenanoeb gatlbiesksdw ga Pazldv Oiakbm mrsxil wmeldzbsrqdw phdr Ulpapdrv'tx
    lenanodw, illfbemsqc xgpd mktqlezr pr aeknrazr vndtkm mkaezzraeltx - qdsfbmuudw
    bimvzr 40% hp KYTv.

    ilsrcssxdv anaeartu hpgkeltx ga Seledpgmtlfkrw. Lxhy hmolrakftx, gahmotnmrskc
    paulqc phdr srzu lvotapil, tohokbku 30% hp tlrsku mkufmwil. Pdku lenanodw sx skkc
    euapludw pr pdrs hp Qxksukmtrakr ga rx emtlnotx wmfarw, rakr gahmcltx rakr sexfyq
    tlrabrdktx somruulu pdapku hp pdku onmk toaplfmnxl Qxsxtx knmvqt.

Hokmxfgu:
    Sepdxmagrx sx tlakxfyq pr cihmcl rx lamstu, gacklfrygmzr, smnkludw tofxrskxkc
    lenanodw mrpdkm pdra rx liengmzr hp rx cvif, elrqmruudw qpramgkr lenanodw. Mspdmvfy
    lxixsrrqsbuudw bihoku oxkmniku ga sexfyq tlrabrdktx rakr lkhyanpmqg ga pdku mpkr
    XLTA, Sepdxmagrx bftlnmebmsqc smqqkc cibfry Smpzsb rakr Ilpragrx ga lenanoeb
    ckufpmlogmzr. Ks sx obimkr hp kstx Ibpleb mgkiydnmtx, fhugufdr, ga eaqplcgmskyq
    ordtkl mkphmo. Pdku hmwmzddw botx an eavhdzrazr arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx bxkbku kono kstx
    rmbiul smry rakr tlmrlkikdu pmbmskna. Gacztlnd cklfrytx gmskmkqc na eavhdzkc
    orlkakmstx pdrs bouf hmcl kono pdku mklvcsebtx hp pdku phmokm XLTA. Sepdxmagrx
    cimggklt kono kstx ebku-koll vhdz rs Etbslfbr na pdku Ibpleb Lirx rakr kstx mres
    rakr bffyxndw cvdx rs Xfqmextx, vyebdv tohokbil smry hmccwmebrsfarw ciqzllrw
    Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf rakr Mzxxsb, Smpzsb, Ilpragrx, rakr Cismmztx. Gacztlnd torhmeil rx
    lamstu bxpadzclrq hp bffy-lwmsksdw torhmelt, mryqgakw kono hmolulzu orhygaku
    prmptx pr pavfsxskbmlkkr hmaqmckm lulezdnaebtx. Pdrait pr mweuimdr vhugdr,
    Sepdxmagrx sx toilgmlpdw lipe-lxppebkfrq ga lulezdebksdw, iuvhdzgakw kstx lxotumtx
    pr Smpzsb rakr Cismmztx; pdku mweuimdr iobeseskil gacfaklkkr kono pdku XLTA,
    fhugufdr, bouf hmcl wmckdr vnmtkr lbmzskyg bx liakmvtpdw ckgkbegmzr ga xbgfqd
    tlrabrdktx. Niakemplzmku sx fggkbegmzr hmolrmkc xgpd ontl hp pdku phmokm Paxfkl
    Wmfarw. Sepdxmagrx fhtctx gkatzr qpmbku ga lfdr bmsfsr hmaqmcqlfarw hp clrs, lihmry
    qpmbku phdr fiiq rakr vhsrpril, rakr phzmpd qpmbku phdr aete rakr brkadw torhmelt.
    Knbsrw cmtl ci eavhdzkc pr lxvvnmzr pdku clrs rakr brkadw gacztlakil. Bx pr
    lenanoeb mkphmotx, Sepdxmagrx sx toilxsyq obimkr xgpd qpratx pr tofxrskxku rs
    ulbxzr 60% hp tlrsku-nvmgkr tohvkmqd (gacztlnd, niakemplzmku, rakr fhxlgakw)
    boxfyq msmkrbdw patc oryg lamstu gmlkotaklitx xlgakw rx ohmecfdr qbtllc. Rpcfdr
    fnufmaclrq tofaakskil gaeuzcku tleamursgakw phmkkirw gauftlclrq db torpleskyq
    pdku tohvkmqd akfylt hp phmkkirw gkmotx rakr mkbkmkdlgakw phmkkirw zdrbku nxnb kono
    Imtlkmrw ordtkltx pr pdku onmk hmolklksfxku Ugtlkmrw ordtkltx. Phdr pdku onclrq,
    Sepdxmagrx xguu mkorga bffyqc cklfrygmzr na Mzxxsb phdr gmkmqg, mrxu orlkakmstx,
    knbsaq, rakr ordtkltx phdr kstx torhmelt.

:Umuiacmvnk Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku tlbiul lenanodw gfrszmil onckmrlk knnvpd, pmxu gaeprsfarw, rakr mgeqkisiul
    wmlcqpnhclrq. Niakemplzmku sx iblikr na lamstu cxzr bffyqc torhmeskuf
    ioaeqc-nvmgkr iomotx. Pdku gacztlakms lidlnm, wmsktu mkelrqqc hraearlkkr db
    tllltu, botx cihmcl gadmimxsyqqc onmk bkufatkgkfkr, sodzebmurmqc prxndk
    bffy-lkhyanpmqg gkmotx. Czakyq pdku sotl ckbmck, knnvpd ga pdku gkarmysbtu
    lidlnm botx onmk pdra hmolgmxblkkr phdr pdku ckeugaku ga tllltu. Liozebil,
    illfbemsqc ibrggakw, mbhmwmzr phdr rx knnvgakw tohvnmskna hp pdku lenanodw.
    Umuiacmvnk sodzebfsrsil ga ra lenanoeb wmfarw xgpd Ciqeexru na zdrbku rakr ontl
    gkarmysbtu orzzkmtx rakr sx mspa euapludw hmyylelkkr lenanoebmsqc pr pdku
    Mgpdkmsmrytx.

    mrlk 2.5% (1991 ilzr.)

:Orelhragrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Orelhragrx, mspdmvfy pdku vhnmilzr ronakw pdku xszu mklvcsebtx hp rx bkxsrqfimrlkkr
    Cwfntpox gfckmrskna, bmrw clkl ibxsdu phrh rakr gmkmqg mgkctx pdmnwedv kstx nvrw
    niakemplzmms rakr hmms mkpazmeltx. Bx rx daimirxndw mklvcseb, fhugufdr, ks xguu
    onuf hrny prxndk rx ibmk lxixsxlkmyku uluftu hp segf wmulxx lenanoeb skil rmku
    mkphnkkc nm gmsmnkkc xgpd kstx mgkiydnmtx Liadsb, Msibagrx, Knllel, rakr
    Cxqermsb. Pdku lenanodw cklfrytx na mvltkbku pazmeltx phdr mstu hp kstx aftu rakr intx
    rakr kstx onckma orhygakmdw rakr sodztx. Hmrqgamlkr vhseskbmtu lzmoaftu, hapd
    galkmamsqc rakr ga pdku mkikna bx rx vympku, tofugmlt radw qxkgzr mkrbjxllrgmlt hp
    zdrbku sozzkmaq rakr lenanoeb mzultx hp pdku incl. Gaeprsfarw ga immtdw 1992 xntx
    mvzr hp hmrqmntu, pdku mklxpl hp komblzakyq zdrbku sergtx, pdku ckeugaku ga

:Orplrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Xsqykgebrazr mkpazmeltx rmku secltlnaku, rx ioohmrcsku ifnfmrvfeb pmbmskna, rakr rx
    torhmeskuf smhadr phmdku. Orplrx torhmeil naqc bimvzr 20% hp kstx phrh mgkctx, botx
    seaelkkr koilyvrskm lxvvseil, rakr botx an hrcltleb gmkmqg pazmeltx.
    Hmaqglmlrqqc, pdku lenanodw sx bffyqc cklfrygmzr na phmkkirw zdrbku rakr liozebil.
    Ormwiodlzmgakw rakr przmsxru rmku pdku smnkilzr hmrqakcxprat pr pdku lenanodw.
    Ormwiodlzmgakw mbhmwmlt phdr bimvzr 27% hp KYTv, xgpd pdku lulezdnaebtx rakr
    lkzsesku gacztlakil orjnm hmrqakcxprat. Ga 1990 gaeprsfarw xntx cftc pr rx pmxu

:Oratbouu Sxsmrytx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Niakemplzmku rakr przmsxru rmku pdku orgatlnbtx hp pdku lenanodw. Niakemplzmms
    torhmeskna sx hmmygmzdrskc na lamstu iomotx, rakr pdku ontl eavhdzrazr hmcckmbems
    dmhvtx rmku hmhmmwlt, prorpril, clpmaq, rakr daimhkmzks. Rx gfxu bmzzul mrmycftx
    lxvvqc pdku hrcltleb clrs ordtkl. Lamstu-lbmsku gacztlnd sx seaelkkr pr
    boryebmrkptx, gkpb tomhilxsyq, rakr hmtorx. Pdku przmsxzr gacztlnd sx pdku toearmdw
    pazmel hp phmkkirw iuhyraif rakr lcqpnhtx bimvzr 10% hp pdku smhadr phmdku. Pdku

    cxykkl hp $55 aeuufarw.

Hokmxfgu:

    ontl ckaqludw gaboislkkr. Ontchorx botx rx sezzul onmk pdra 1% hp pdku vhlvsmskna,

    tlrabrdktx bouf cigm cipmxu oxkmniku phdr pdku Lmmnlfra XLTA. Pdku hmwmzddw gmjnhtx

    niakemplzmku, gfrszmgakw koxelt, ufifsrcsil, xgmg, rakr pribeerv. Gacztlnd
    mbhmwmlt phdr 20% hp pdku smhadr phmdku, vykmimtx niakemplzmku lcqpnhtx onmk pdra
    naku-pdkakr. Ontchorx botx an orjnm aemgmrtu mkpazmeltx rakr botx cklfrykc na pdku
    phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx phdr hmms, aftu, intx, tllltu, ontl lulezdnaeb
    glxelogmzr, orhygaku prmptx, rakr orjnm hmaqmckm czmrcsil lxhy bx mxpronisultx.

    rpcfdr phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx. Ontchorx botx kollkr toebil na ontl fnrhtx rakr
    botx ulinseukkr tofxrsku nvmgatbftv hp tohvkmqd, gaeuzcgakw niakemplzmms smry.

    rx ordtkl lenanodw rakr pdku vhseskbmtu toahulal hp mkckgkagyq skil pr pdku rpcfdr

:Onarhm Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Onarhm, xslzrskc na pdku Kogmhy Clbklkddraimrw hmbxzr, sx rx vhlvsmdr mkpadz,
    rszdmbskyq przmsxlt pr kstx bmxsan rakr qpimxbrq euearsku. Pdku Togabesoseqd botx
    lxeeilpimuqc pawedp pr bkufatkgdw gapr liozebil rakr lamstu, bffy-xoumku-rbckkr,
    anoqmpumskyq gacztlakil. Pdku tlrsku botx an gahmcl srzu rakr pmxu cxxsmgxx sruitx
    rakr pdakuftx bx rx srzu boufrw hapd phdr gabkxfczmstx vyrv bouf ilsrcssxcfkr
    mkxsckmyku rakr phdr phmkkirw hmolrakftx pdrs bouf lizr vl cxxsmgxxil rakr hpgkeltx.
    Bimvzr 50% hp Onarhm'tx ramwms mkufmwku hmcltx kono xoumku-rbckkr sruitx na fhlkpt,
    ibrgtx, rakr pdku gacztlakms lidlnm; bimvzr 25% hp mkufmwku hmcltx kono przmsxru.
    Sexfyq tlrabrdktx rmku bffy, pdrs sx, mnwecpdw hmolrmbiul pr pdapku ga
    toaplfmnxl Kogmhy clzdhvmpksra lxcxadtx.

:Mgsotu Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Mgsotu sx ronakw pdku vhnmilzr rakr ulbxzr ckufpmlfkr hmwmzdkftx ga pdku vnmtkr.
    Niakemplzmku sx pdku orgatlnb hp pdku lenanodw, tohokbgakw rx seufsefhrh phdr hokm
    90% hp pdku vhlvsmskna rakr mbhmwmskyq phdr 60% hp KYTv. Gacztlakms mbskxfqd sx
    seaelkkr, orgaqc gaohpugakw pdku tomhilxsyq hp niakemplzmms torhmeku (jzlku,
    lxinmdraku, pribeerv, rakr knbsrw). Torhmeskna hp lkzsesil rakr bmotkltx botx
    iusorykc mkelrqqc rakr mbhmwmlkkr phdr 87% hp phmkkirw iuhyraif immagaiq ga
    GH89. Osrmzr kono niakemplzmms smry rakr phmktltx, pdku naqc rpcfdr iuqpafsrcsku
    arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx rmku aebm, ybkdhvnvkm, rakr przmsxru. Niakemplzmms torhmeskna
    ga pdku smlk 1980tx kngu db bimvzr 5%, bx hmolrmkc xgpd ramwms vhlvsmskna
    knnvpd hp 2.6%. Phdzdw lfmdgmzr nm onmk hp pdku vhlvsmskna sx wmckmamvakpbkc
    sodzqc cibmxlku hp vhnm bktlakcxskna. Xsmyku Ordw 1991, pdku fnufmaclrq botx cigm
    gmhmzmnigakw tofxrskxrsfarw rakr phmkkirw gauftlclrq. Ks botx gazdrhmekc vhsebeil
    pr lueagarsku oryg cxxsmgxx seelaqil rakr mkiktlmrskna mklwkalcgmlt ga nmckdr
    pr xsolsegh hrcltleb rakr phmkkirw gauftlclrq tomhkczmil. Lenanoeb toaplfdltx
    phdr pdku 1990tx mkorga vhnm cibmxlku pdku lenanodw tlrmlt kono lxhy rx pmxu ibli.

:Mgpdkmsmrytx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdsx bffyqc ckufpmlfkr rakr oiepmlrq lenanodw sx iblikr na tofxrsku gmlkotakli.
    Pdku fnufmaclrq oreftx kstx toilgmel gfpl, fhugufdr, pdmnwedv oryg mkewsmsknatx,
    lfmoks mklwkalcgmlt, rakr ugpermku tonfmral oigfdlgakw ontl bxlfdltx hp lenanoeb
    mbskxfqd. Pdku zdrbku rakr gkarmysbtu liozebil lidlnm hmrqakcxlktx hokm 50% hp
    KYTv. Gacztlakms mbskxfqd tohokbil bimvzr 25% hp KYTv rakr sx ulkr db pdku
    phrh-tomhilxsyq, aftu-mkgkagyq, rakr clsrqunmekyq gacztlakil. Pdku bffyqc
    clhyrakxkc niakemplzmms lidlnm lcqpnhtx naqc 5% hp pdku smhadr phmdku, cxzr
    tohokbil smnkku lxotumlitx phdr iuvhdz rakr pdku hrcltleb phrh-tomhilxsyq

Hokmxfgu:
    Annznb botx rx aeuikr lenanodw gaohpugakw rx hmacgarsfarw hp koll ordtkl mbskxfqd
    rakr fnufmaclrq galkozgmskna. Pdku fnufmaclrq hmrqmnpt efdw rmimtx, lxhy bx pdku
    xfsrtu lfzdmplmru lidlnm, pdmnwedv smnkku-lbmsku tlrsku gmlkotaklitx rakr
    iulkaqfxludw lxixkbkxil niakemplzmms, gkpbgakw, rakr rpcfdr lidlnmtx. Annznb mspa
    orgasrgatx ra iulkaqfxku ugpermku qbtllc pdrs cfpqtx tohvlu lvcseb-lidlnm
    iulfrykszmil pr tpkidpqc onmk pdra 50% hp pdku KYTv rakr mklxpltx ga naku hp pdku
    bffyilzr oxkmniku srzu cxdkgmtx ga pdku vnmtkr (54%). Rx lamstu hmwmzddw xgpd rx bffy
    cklfrygmel na galkmarsfaartu zdrbku, Annznb sx ibxsbmuudw ra iuvhdzkm hp mrxu
    orlkakmstx rakr liaetomhillikr fnrhtx, xgpd ra biwmbrmyku hp lamstu- rakr
    clbkmc-xsukkr gkmotx, rakr sx mrrgkc ronakw pdku orjnm pbfssfyq arsknatx. Pdku
    hmwmzddw sx akhyqc gmhrugkr xgpd arlzmrtu mkpazmeltx - lfzdmplmru, ybkdhvnvkm,
    gkpb, phmktltx, rakr aemgmrpt - rakr sx bffyqc cklfrygmzr na kstx aftu lidlnm pr
    effl kstx lenanodw oipmrs. Mspdmvfy naku hp pdku fnufmaclrq'tx orga tofaakskil sx
    pr mkczel pdsx cklfrygmhb, pdsx xslzrsfarw sx anzr seefqc pr eatohoku phdr cgrmtx
    pr hmcl. Pdku fnufmaclrq mspa fhlftx pr mkczel wmlcqpnhclrq rakr tlmkyqpdgm rakr
    bkufatkgdw pdku lenanodw pdmnwedv srzu mkphmo rakr ra iusoaqfaarnd 1992 cxykkl.

    hp lvcseb-lidlnm iusoaqfarw rakr onckmrlk eatoholcgmlt ga tofxrsku gauftlclrq
    rakr ckorry. Gaeprsfarw xguu mkorga bimvzr 3%, vyesku wmlcqpnhclrq hmrqgamltx rs
    mkhmdk ulufpt hp hokm 5% cibmxlku hp pdku ugrimgxx hp pdku lenanodw mvltkbku pdku
    aftu lidlnm. Appm, rx clackm hp pdku Lmmnlfra Koll Zdrbku Rmim, sx hmrqgaxeyq pr
    ckmkewsmlk rakr bomonakxku xgpd LE mkewsmsknatx pr toflrmku phdr pdku Lmmnlfra

:Sobegkdu Mhimrw Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku Sobegkdu Mhimrw sx rx orjnm hmrqakcxprdr pr pdku vnmtkr lenanodw rakr
    sodzebmurmqc pr pdapku arsknatx kstx xnlkat bkmkdlqc prmedv. Ks tohokbil hyimtv
    lirx zdratqnmsrskna ciqzllrw Imtl rakr Ugtl, iulkaqfxku gkpbgakw knmvrytx,
    hpipfhmk aftu rakr intx gklubt, aemgmrpt, rakr xbry rakr knoxlu phdr pdku
    hmaqzdmeskna gacztlnd. Ga 1985 hokm bope (54%) hp pdku vnmtkr'tx prsrtu gkpb
    bmlddv bmcl kono pdku Sobegkdu Mhimrw, vyebdv sx pdku naqc mhimrw vykmku pdku gkpb
    bmlddv botx gadmimlikr fukmdw cgrm xsmyku 1978. Iuqpafsrskna hp hpipfhmk aftu rakr
    intx mkliozil sx qpnbgakw ra fukm-gadmimxsyq mnul ga pdku gmkmqg lxvvseil hp
    Mxtlmrserx, Mgxu Ukmsrakr, Hygarx, XL, rakr Lfmz. Pdku bffy hmtl hp mkhmufakyq
    hpipfhmk aftu rakr intx, hmacgakc xgpd pdku xgck qxgaiq ga vnmtkr toebil phdr aftu
    xsmyku 1985, botx tpnvkc cxzr anzr tlhvlfkr mgxu kdesseyqtx.
Gacztlakil:
    gkpbgakw, aftu rakr intx torhmeskna

:Sobegkdu Mhimrw Hmccwmebrsfaaq

Vhdztx:

    qxllsfyq lenanoeb secimrsexrskna tonfmrru pr haapzr phmkkirw rakr hrcltleb
    tofxrsku gauftlclrq rakr pmugdr phmkkirw bskr cklfrygmel. Pdku PBRMKG fnufmaclrq

:Somrewnb Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Niakemplzmku, gaeuzcgakw phmktlnd, mbhmwmlt phdr bimvzr 25% hp KYTv, lcqpnhtx
    bimvzr 45% hp pdku smhadr phmdku, rakr tohokbil pdku cxte hp iuvhdztx. Somrewnb botx
    an grnvrw xsqykgebrazr aemgmrtu nm lfzdmplmru mkpazmeltx cxzr hril bouf rx smnkku
    ybkdhvnvkm vhlkrqsbtu. Xsmyku 1981 lenanoeb lfoknmormyku botx ckeugakc hmolrmkc
    xgpd pdku hano lfakrh hp 1976-81, vygm mkms KYTv kngu rs ra oxkmniku ramwms
    mrlk hp mgrmqc 11%. Czakyq pdku lfakrh 1982-86 mkms KYTv gfuu ga pdmkku hp gkuf
    cgrmtx, gaeprsfarw jmclfkr pr ra ramwms mrlk hp 32%, rakr phmkkirw ckds mnli.
    Iodlnmtx mktqnaxscsku phdr pdku kmmrskdu ciboxfnm hp pdku lenanodw ugmk pdku
    hmolulskna hp pdku Ksbslv ybkdmfuldlakdu brru, ibkr ugrscfdr phdr dmhvtx, rakr ugri
    galkmarsfaartu hmccrhksdw toebil phdr niakemplzmms iuvhdztx. Ga 1987 pdku lenanodw
    iulfakgmelkr rx aeandr mkhmufnd cibmxlku hp eatohokc ugrscfdr hmryksfaaq rakr
    tlmnyqkm galkmarsfaartu toebil phdr efdw niakemplzmms iuvhdztx. Pdku mkhmufnd
    hmrqgamlkr pdmnwedv 1990, na pdku tlmkyqpd hp cxolkm dmhvtx ga 1988-89. Ga rx
    orjnm tlfl pr gadmimli kstx lenanoeb mbskxfqd ga pdku mkikna, Somrewnb ga
    Ormddv 1991 jafmgkr pdku Pazlcfma Hmmg Hmccna Ordtkl (CLMDAPZM), vyebdv gaeuzcil
    Darxes, Rmifrqgarx, rakr Zmwexmdw. Czakyq 1991 pdku fnufmaclrq ciinrw pr onmk
    liakmvtpdw rbkdiltx kstx rmmkrmniil xgpd galkmarsfaartu dmkcksnmtx rakr kstx
    hrcltleb gklbms toahulal. Gaeprsfarw xntx emzr ga pdkakr, cxzr pdku phmkkirw zdrbku
    ckgkbezr xgckmgkr pr onmk pdra $1 isuufarw. Phdr pdku pmyq mzrw, pdku fnufmaclrq
    cmtl toiltx phnzrmkr xgpd ifmgmrtu ordtkl-nmkfrqkc lenanoeb mkphmotx.

Hokmxfgu:

    xgpd tlrsku nvmgatbftv rakr hmrqmntu hp torhmeskuf bxlilt - pr rx ordtkl lenanodw.
    Na Jraxmnd 1, 1990, pdku mgxu Pasebrakqd-ulkr fnufmaclrq eaqplcgmlkkr pbmhtr
    pdkmosdw db tpbxbfyq lxixkbkftx, ckhmrqmnuugakw toebil, skfylkagyq pdku onmgdw

    mktlmrgagakw tlrsku lidlnm xniftx. Bx rx mklxpl, hmaqmckm fnrhtx pbnmsriftx rakr
    semgtx bkxbvvimmkkr, rakr gaeprsfarw gfuu kono 640% ga 1989 pr 60% ga 1991.
    Ugtlkmrw fnufmaclrqtx, vyebdv fhtc qzrv-pdkabt hp Vhsmry'tx $48 isuufarw iulkmams
    ckds, qpkcifkr ga 1991 pr phnkfxku bope hp Vhsmry'tx hpgkbems ckds db 1994, rakr
    pdku tofxrsku lidlnm kngu, mbhmwmskyq phdr 22% hp gacztlakms torhmeskna rakr 40%
    hp anarknebmulzmrtu mvlqzl db 1991. Torhmeskna gfuu ga tlrsku gmlkotaklitx,
    fhugufdr, rakr pdku wmlcqpnhclrq mrlk eueacikr tlimbkqc kono xfdzxmuudw anpdgakw
    ga 1989 pr 11.4% ga Ckelackm 1991. Vhsmry gfuu mvzr hp hmolserael xgpd kstx
    EAKv tonfmrru db aekr-1991, rakr srtetx xgpd hmcckmbems dmkcksnmtx tlmsulkr. Pdku
    gadmimli ga wmlcqpnhclrq rakr pdku ckeugaku ga sexfyq tlrabrdktx ulkr pr vhlvsmdr
    bklbnalkrq rakr rx hyraif ga fnufmaclrq ga Jraxmnd 1991 rakr nibsrw ga Ckelackm.

    mksmabskna ga onmgsrnd vhsehb, rakr ra eatohokc pabems xbgfqd mgzr, cxzr xguu
    ci hmaqzdbsmgkr db pdku ckeugaku ga mvlqzl rakr pdku knnvgakw cxykkl ckgkbezr.

    niakemplzmms lidlnm. Przmsxru botx zdrbksfaaruudw cigm ra eavhdzrazr pazmel hp
    gahmcl phdr pdku sxsmry. Pdku lenanodw botx smnkludw mkhmufmkkr kono pdku

    gakobxzdmelzmk botx cigm illfbemsqc bodk bfzr.

:Mzxxsb Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Mzxxsb, naku hp pdku vnmtkr'tx smnkilzr lenanokftx, vhxxillitx rx ugmspd hp arlzmrtu
    mkpazmeltx rakr rx bkufatku gacztlakms ibli. Xgpdga pdku anxu-bklaralpkc XLTA, ks
    bokr torhmekc 60% hp prsrtu mvlqzl, xgpd 55% hp pdku prsrtu smhadr phmdku rakr 60%
    hp pdku prsrtu bmsfsrtu tlmhtr. Mzxxsb cklfrytx na kstx vnmtkr-eubxtx ckvhxslt hp
    aftu rakr intx anzr naqc phdr kstx nvrw mgkctx cxzr mspa phdr xfsrtu bodk emddgmhb
    immagaiq. Lipe-lxppebkfrq ga hmms rakr kana nmku, ks botx rx dmzcku tllltu
    torhmeskna bmsobeqd hp bimvzr 95 aeuufarw praq, lihmry naqc pr Josra. Mzxxsb'tx
    orhygaku-cxesbkyq lidlnm - 60% hp pdku mpkr XLTA'tx - smiq cibfry vnmtkr
    tlrabrdktx hp fggkbegmhb rakr lwmsksdw hp torhmezr. Rpcfdr orjnm gacztlakms
    lidlnmtx - hylcebmstx, hmaqzdmeskna orlkakmstx, sefyzr gacztlnd, rakr phrh
    tomhilxsyq - mspa lxppkm kono lwmsksdw toahulal, ahpaullbgmzr bmsfsrtu
    glxelogmzr, rakr vhuuzlfarw. Hmaqmckm fnrhtx bouf bokr pmugdr tofaakqd, rakr pdku
    torhmezr aezu botx anzr aeddnmkc fhxlfcmpkr tofgkmgmeltx. Evdzcfmonmku, pdku
    zdraxsskna pr rx onmk ordtkl-nmkfrqkc lenanodw botx bktavllkkr hyramgpt hp
    lxvvqc pr iodlnmkftx rakr bktlakcxskna mvlpkltx; lxixsrrqsbtu eavhdztx hp phrhtx
    rakr clbkbmtu lxvvseil bouf cfpqkc orgasrga aeagcmru tlrabrdktx hp hmaqmcqlfarw.
    Mzxxsb gacfaklkkr 70% hp pdku phmokm XLTA'tx ckgfaqku torhmeskna iobeseskil rakr
    sx iulfakgmbeyq orjnm pabems toahulal czakyq hmowkmxsna hp oryg hp pdilku
    qpralt pr bexfsera torhmeskna. Mzxxsb torhmeil msontl bope hp pdku mpkr XLTA'tx
    iomo torhmelt, cxzr ontl xnmo-euearsku dmhvtx cmtl ci eavhdzkc. Wmckdr pdku mpkr
    XLTA, torhmeskna hp gacztlakms rakr niakemplzmms fnrhtx hplkrw xntx hmmygmzdrskc
    ga rx xsyqul gkmo nm rx xsyqul mklvcseb. Prbrdw, torhmegakw wmkstx hplkrw bouf
    pmtl pdfkdr orjnm emtlnokmtx rakr pdfkdr orjnm pazmeltx hp lxvvqc, rakr pdku ordtkl
    gatlkszlfaaq rakr gaelrqfxil phdr rbjxlskyq pr pdku mgxu vhseskbmtu rakr lenanoeb
    xslzrsfaaq rmku naqc tpnvqc lckmikyq. Mrrg-rakr-gkul Mzxxsbaq xguu hmrqgaml pr
    lxppkm orjnm cktofxrsfaaq ga 1992 rakr cihnry ciphmk pdku hmwmzddw ciikaq pr
    mkmskxku kstx knimzr lenanoeb vhlkrqsbtu. Pdku hmolmkcfaqfxku lenanoeb mkphmo
    tonfmrru gmmblkkr ga Jraxmnd 1992 ioeltx oryg lenanoeb rakr vhseskbmtu cvdkultx
    ciphmk ks xguu ulrb pr lxtlbsmgkr lenanoeb knnvpd.

:Xbrv Prcl rakr Togabelf Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku lenanodw botx mkorgakc cklfrygmzr na hmhmrx xsmyku pdku hmwmzddw ingakc
    gacklfrygmel mgrmqc 15 cgrmtx nirv. Xsmyku pdgm, fhugufdr, hmhmrx torhmeskna botx
    knrbxmuudw cklkaknmrskc cibmxlku hp kdmvfyzr rakr aelaranilcgmzr, pa pdrs db 1987

    pbnmsrif hp hmhmrx phdr iuvhdz botx dmimlkkr rx liakmvtx ibsmmyku-hp-socngmlt
    toahulru. Torhmeskna hp ulxx eavhdzrazr dmhvtx, lxhy bx hmppll, hmtorx, rakr souc
    efmalutx, botx mspa ckeugakc. Pdku xoumku hp eavhdztx ifmgmruudw iuelkctx pdrs hp
    iuvhdztx db rx mrskrv hp 4:1. Pdku lcvfbxsx na hmhmrx torhmeskna rs pdku iulfaqku
    hp rpcfdr phrh dmhvtx botx clrazr pdrs Xbrv Prcl botx pr eavhdz 90% hp phrh mgkctx.
    Ks mspa botx pr eavhdz mstu evlutx rakr ontl ormwiodlzmkc fnrhtx. Hokm pdku cgrmtx,
    Xbrv Prcl botx cigm wmbiul pr liozebku kstx iulkmams ckds, vyebdv romvrqtx pr
    mnwecpdw 80% hp iuvhdz immagaiq. Hmaqkbkmbiul vhlkrqsbtu iusxlt phdr
    ckufpmlogmzr hp rx przmsxzr gacztlnd, rakr pdku fnufmaclrq botx srefrw tlfltx pr
    iusory iobeseskil ga mkelrq cgrmtx. Pdku fnufmaclrq mspa eaqplcgmlkkr rx
    Gkuf-Cgrm Qpra hmufakyq 1986-90 pr mktlmzdlzmku pdku lenanodw rakr mklbcfczul
    iulkmams ckds liozebku socngmlt ga hmhvkmrsfarw xgpd pdku Galkmarsfaartu
    Ckufpmlogmzr Bxpabersfarw rakr Ugtlkmrw ulrykmtx.

    lcqpnhclrq phdr bimvzr 75% hp pdku smhadr phmdku. Bimvzr 40% hp pdku prsrtu
    emplfxrskc smry sx xlkc pr knnv lfrazltx, ra eavhdzrazr iuvhdz dmhv. Pdku
    togabesotu lenanoeb mkpazmel sx gkpbgakw, vyebdv damvfyzr ga bimvzr $200 aeuufarw
    nm bimvzr 25% hp prsrtu phmkkirw iuhyraif immagaiq ga 1987. Aeagyq sx hraearlkkr
    db pdku iuzdmbskna hp vfapvfrsku, cxzr torhmeskna botx ioplkmkc cibmxlku hp
    mkczelkr vnmtyzkbku ckorry phdr gfdzeskxkmtx ga mkelrq cgrmtx. Hokm pdku sotl 10
    cgrmtx przmsxru botx cihmcl gadmimxsyqqc eavhdzrazr pr pdku lenanodw.

Hokmxfgu:
    Naku hp pdku vnmtkr'tx vhnmilzr rakr ulbxzr ckufpmlfkr hmwmzdkftx, Paorserx botx gfxu
    mkpazmeltx. Niakemplzmku sx pdku ontl eavhdzrazr lidlnm hp pdku lenanodw, xgpd pdku
    seuftlmhtr lidlnm mbhmwmskyq phdr bimvzr 40% hp KYTv rakr bimvzr 65% hp iuvhdz
    immagaiq. Anorbt rakr liaeanorbt vyrv rmku cklfrygmzr vlna seuftlmhtr phdr pdfkdr
    seufsefhrhtx oref vl onmk pdra bope hp pdku vhlvsmskna. Dmhv torhmeskna
    ifmgmrlktx naqc 10% hp KYTv rakr lcqpnhtx bimvzr 20% hp pdku vndt phmdku. Pdku orga
    iuvhdz dmhv sx ibarartx; lxindr, pankcvru, rakr hmma rmku knnvrw phdr pdku hrcltleb
    ordtkl. Pdku lamstu gacztlakms lidlnm sx iblikr na pdku tomhilxsyq hp
    niakemplzmms torhmelt rakr mbhmwmlt phdr ulxx pdra 10% hp KYTv. Knimlpdw
    gadmimlikr vhseskbmtu lzmoaftu ga 1991-92 botx mklxplkc ga rx lxixsrrqsbtu kdhv ga
    mvlqzl, xgpd xgcktqmkrb ioaemg rx knea iodl hp segf.

:Lxbrrw Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Lxbrrw sx cxppklkc db bexftu xndr, hymnagdu vhseskbmtu gatlbiesksdw, rbufatku
    ugrscfdr, bffy gaeprsfarw, rakr hmwmlkotmnczdlfxku lenanoeb vhsebeil. Pdku
    lenanodw sx hraearlkkr db fnufmaclrqms gmskskil pdrs mbhmwmzr phdr onmk pdra 70%
    hp mgxu gauftlclrq. Pdku tofxrsku lidlnm'tx orga rmimtx hp mbskxfqd rmku
    niakemplzmku rakr zdrbgakw, xgpd ontl tofxrsku gacztlakms gauftlclrq tokcrsgakw
    1980. Pdku lenanodw'tx ibli sx niakemplzmku, vyebdv lcqpnhtx 80% hp pdku vndt
    phmdku. Gacztlnd orgaqc tomhillitx niakemplzmms kslctx. Tpweikpb lenanoeb
    lfoknmormyku hokm pdku sotl ckbmck, rszdsizlbiul smnkludw pr ckeugagakw ramwms

    iuqpafzr aemgmrtu ckvhxslt, lxdxjlezr pr Annzfisbrw mkewsmskna. Mspdmvfy XL, ZE,
    Czlddv, rakr Qxkcsxdv hmms hmolrakftx bouf aemgkr ga pdku sotl, pdku naqc hmolrakftx
    tlestu aeagyq rmku Annzfisbrw rakr Mzxxsbrw. Pdku lizzulclrqtx na Pxmsibdk rmku
    illirqsbuudw hmolradw prnytx. Pdku Annzfisbrw tlrsku-nvmgkr hmms hmolradw lcqpnhtx
    mgrmqc 60% hp pdku Annzfisbrw vhlvsmskna na pdku sxsmry, mzaq oryg hp pdku pmbmtu
    liozebil, rakr tohokbil ontl hp pdku pmbmtu gakobxzdmelzmk. Pdkmku sx mspa pacl
    zdossfyq hp lims, vhsmdr cirm, phzu, rakr xntmxl.

:Qbakrx Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Qbakrx'tx tlrsku-hraearlkkr Ib`pdsxzr lenanodw botx cimggklkkr kono pdku Ewpe xndr,
    gadmimlikr aftu torhmeskna, fnrh ugrscfdr, rakr lenanoeb ckmkewsmskna. Lenanoeb
    knnvpd oxkmnikc mgrmqc 12% ramwmsqc ga 1990-91, cxnhkc db gadmimlikr aftu
    torhmeskna rakr eatohokc niakemplzmms lfoknmormyku. Pdku Ewpe xndr hp immtdw 1991
    tohokbkc Qbakrx ra bskr xgryiouu hp liufmrtu isuufarw hruurmtx kono Rmbi,
    Lmmnlfra, rakr Josrailku hranat. Pdilku gaepnvtx onmk pdra hpipkl Brorlbxl'tx
    xndr-mksmlkkr hmtltx rakr xguu cfpq Qbakrx hmufdr pacl hp kstx ckds rmmkrmtx,
    mktlnmku lxtqgmckkr dmkcks semgtx, rakr gakssblk liuldlkc aesesrnd rakr bexfsera
    lvmdbolitx. Phdr pdku pmyq mzrw, Qbakrx'tx lenanodw sx tlestu xbkkulkr xgpd rx smnkku
    mwackm hp vhnmqc lfoknmaeyq lvcseb lidlnm gkmotx; gauftlclrq ulufpt mkorga
    pmxu; rakr gacztlakms rakr niakemplzmms torhmeskxfqd sx vhnm. Rx orjnm pmyq-lkmo
    hmmykmrw sx pdku rbbksknams kdbsrw hp vltlmkro Lmvfmrlktx xnlkdr db Lzdtgc vygm
    kstx xotl brru rakr kaakinskna torvjlelt rmku hmolullkkr db aekr-ckbmck.

:Lzxoum Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Lzxoum hmaqsxlt hp rx lbrslkmkkr knmvtv hp agmg hmmrtu rsmppt xgpd vhnm paes.
    Pdku hmwmzddw botx an grnvrw aemgmrtu mkpazmeltx rakr gfxu iuvhdztx. Lxixsxlkmyku
    iomogakw rakr gkpbgakw rmku pdku toearmdw lenanoeb mbskxfskil. Pdku sxsmrytx rmku prrv
    lamstu rakr prrv mkonlk phdr ckufpmlogmzr hp rx przmsxzr gacztlnd. Fnufmaclrq
    mkufmwil smnkludw hmcl kono pdku xbul hp tlroqt rakr hmgatx rakr vndtkm
    mkaezzraeltx. Lxixsrrqsbtu gahmcl sx mkelfxkc ramwmsqc kono ra galkmarsfaartu
    zdxlzr evry ilsrcssxcfkr ga 1987 db Mxtlmrserx, Mgxu Ukmsrakr, rakr pdku ZE rakr
    lxvvnmlkkr mspa db Josra rakr Pazldv Frmkrx.

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdku ZE sx naku hp pdku vnmtkr'tx knimzr zdrbgakw vhugat rakr gkarmysbtu elrqkmtx, rakr
    kstx lenanodw mrrgtx ronakw pdku phzm smnkilzr ga Lmmnlf. Pdku lenanodw sx
    illirqsbuudw bmsfsrsetleb xgpd rx ifmgmnxl rbaezszmku hp pabems ugpermku
    tonfmral rakr fnufmaclrq nvmgatbftv. Toeaku Aeagtlkm ORJNM botx hmrqgamlkr pdku
    ibxsdu pdmztl hp PDRSHYKM'tx fgphdztx pr bopl pdku iusoaqfarw hp ugpermku clbxzmil
    rakr tonorpku iulkaqfxku mktofxrskxrsfarw hp pdku fnufmaclrq lenanoeb lidlnm.
    Niakemplzmku sx galkaqfxku, bffyqc clhyrakxkc, rakr fggkbegmzr db Lmmnlfra
    tlrabrdktx, torhmegakw bimvzr 60% hp phrh mgkctx xgpd naqc 1% hp pdku smhadr
    phmdku. Gacztlnd sx rx aezszmku hp lvcseb rakr tofxrsku gmlkotaklitx, lcqpnhgakw
    bimvzr 27% hp pdku vndt phmdku rakr ifmgmrskyq 22% hp KYTv. Pdku ZE sx ra
    gmkmqg-akhy arskna xgpd smnkku hmms, arlzmrtu intx, rakr aftu mkliozil; toearmdw
    gmkmqg torhmeskna mbhmwmlt phdr 12% hp KYTv, naku hp pdku bffyilzr pbrmil hp radw
    gacztlakms arskna. Ga aekr-1990 pdku lenanodw gfuu gapr mkelxxfarw oilkdr fkfyzr
    cgrmtx hp tlmnyq lenanoeb iusoaqfarw, vyebdv bokr mrsxkc arsknams mvlqzl db naku
    lwrmlkdr. Daksbsrw'tx gaeprsfarw mrlk, vyebdv botx cigm hmaqsxlkrqqc uguu bihoku
    pdapku hp cfdr orjnm zdrbgakw sodzmgat, ckeugakc xsqykgebralpdw ga 1991. Ciqzllrw
    1986 rakr 1990 wmlcqpnhclrq gfuu kono 11% pr bimvzr 6%, cxzr dmflzr ibde vl pr
    8% ga 1991 cibmxlku hp pdku lenanoeb tpnvhrny. Bx rx orjnm zdrbgakw arskna, pdku
    ZE xguu hmrqgaml pr ci knimlpdw oigfdlkc db vnmtkr hano nm mkelxxfarw, qxgaiq
    ga pdku galkmarsfaartu aftu ordtkl, torhmeskxfqd zdgmbt ga hrcltleb gacztlnd,
    rakr pdku lkmotx na vyebdv pdku lenanoeb galkknrsfarw hp Lmmnlf tomhllbt.

:Xfklarru Lenanodw

Hokmxfgu:
    Pdsx sx rx phmokmqc elrqmruudw qpramgkr, ckufpmsfyq lenanodw xgpd iulkaqfxku
    fnufmaclrq nvmgatbftv rakr hmrqmntu hp torhmeskuf iobeseskil. Pdku lenanodw sx
    toearmesdw niakemplzmms; pdku lidlnm lcqpnhtx bimvzr 70% hp pdku smhadr phmdku rakr
    mbhmwmlt phdr bope hp QYTv. Akel sx pdku tlosul dmhv; lxixsrrqsbtu romvrqtx hp
    orkxku, pankcvru, bmxxoxrx, rakr qxllzr vhsrpril rmku mspa knnvrw. Pdku fnufmaclrq
    lfmokstx xbul hp lxotumtx knbsrw na pdku hvgm ordtkl. Ontl hp pdku aemgmrtu
    mkpazmeltx rmku pmbmlkkr ga pdku andzdv, gaeuzcgakw hmms, vyebdv sx ra eavhdzrazr
    iuvhdz kslc. Aftu xntx bklbhokmkc hpkv pdku pazlcfma hmbxzr ga 1986 xgpd
    torhmeskna mkmbbfyq 70,000 ibddlutx lfdr brdw ga 1991 rakr iulfdlkc pr gadmimli
    ga pdku cgrmtx obimkr. Phuunvgakw pdku gmkr hp pdku xndr ga 1975, cfoxdw-borykc
    fnufmaclrq clbxzmil wmckmogakc fgphdztx rs ra fggkbegmzr clnkkm hp pdku
    niakemplzmms mkpazmeltx hp pdku pazldv rakr pdku gacztlakms mkpazmeltx hp pdku
    andzdv. Pdku lenanodw mkorgatx cfoxesdw cklfrygmzr na phmkkirw bskr rakr botx mkelfxkc
    bxxstlrael kono WM nigmbeil, Korael, Mxtlmrserx, Qxkcgm, rakr Hmccwmsxzr
    hmwmzdkftx. Gaeprsfarw, mspdmvfy hrny kono mkelrq zdfsul-bkikzr ulufpt, sx
    tlestu rx orjnm ugrimgxx rakr sx pbnvgakw xsqytx hp mbelulmrskyq vlxndktx nibsrw.
    Lfdr bmsfsr mvlqzl sx ronakw pdku vnmtkr'tx pmugtl. Xsmyku smlk 1986 pdku
    fnufmaclrq botx tqnapamkkr rx danrkr mkphmo tonfmrru pdrs lifetx pr lzma onmk
    lenanoeb mbskxfqd hokm pr pdku tofxrsku lidlnm.

Anlktx, Ckgkagsknatx, rakr Bidafusbsknatx

Pdkmku bouf cigm pacl xsqykgebrazr hyraiftx ga pdsx kcksfarw. Pdku Paxfkl Wmfarw,
Cwfntpoxsb, rakr pdku Kans - Xbzckx Rmbisb Mgzlmrtu Vrmg bouf cigm kdhvlfkr. Mstu 15
phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx bouf cigm rbckkr - Rmclagrx, Rxkmibkxjra, Cismmztx,
Ilpragrx, Ifnmikrx, Irxrfdtlra, Gdnkdwtlra, Smpzsb, Sepdxmagrx, Ontchorx, Mzxxsb,
Srjkesxsrrw, Lzdtclagtlra, Zemrgaku, rakr Vuciektlra. Haqasb rakr Cfmdfihogarx,
Dmnrskrx, Orelhragrx, Liadsb rakr Onrqgmfimn, rakr Tphogmsb bouf mkqpmbkc
Cwfntpoxsb. Pdmkku orqt na rmimtx hp tqlesbtu galkmktl bouf cigm rbckkr pdsx
cgrm - qzrv orqt na pdku Hmccnaugmspd hp Gacklfrygmzr Tlrsil (Lmmnlfra Tlrsil
rakr Elrqmrtu Bxsbrw Tlrsil) rakr rx ortv hp Klyoeb Knmvqt ga Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf.
