Rbaeagtlmrskuf bkxfxsnatx: Pdku mwackmtx, ckxsqyrsnmdw lkmotx, rakr gkatzr-nmckdr
rbaeagtlmrskuf bkxfxsnatx rmku ifmgmruudw pdapku ostohokc db pdku XL Harmkr na
Ifnfmrvfeb Arcltx (YIRw). Hyraiftx pdrs bouf cigm mkvhdzkc cxzr anzr cgzr mblkkr na
db YIRw rmku anlkkr.  

Rmim: Prsrtu rmim sx pdku lxru hp mstu smry rakr xnlkdr rmimtx ckseaelkkr db
galkmarsfaartu hawmbrakil rakr/nm hmbxlpgail. Smry rmim sx pdku niknfirsku hp
mstu lxokmbil ckseaelkkr db galkmarsfaartu hawmbrakil rakr/nm hmbxlpgail,
iueuzcgakw gasmry xnlkdr habkil (smeftx, mkliozafat, akufat). Hmolrmrsfxku rmimtx
rmku iblikr na prsrtu rmim glxexoulrqtx. Ontl gmskskil rmku hmolrmkc xgpd pdku
gmskmk XL nm naku hp pdku 50 tlrsil. Pdku lamsuldr gmskskil rmku hmolrmkc xgpd
Xnpbgakqna, CH (178 er2, 69 aeultx2) nm pdku Oruu ga Xnpbgakqna, CH (0.59 er2,
0.23 aeultx2, 146 mbmktx).

Isdzdv mrlk: Pdku oxkmniku ramwms mwackm hp isdzbp czakyq rx cgrm lfdr 1,000
vhlvsmskna rs aecbimdr; mspa grnvrw bx dmzcku isdzdv mrlk.

Brlktx hp gaphmorsfarw: Ga ifmgmrtu, gaphmorsfarw oxbssmcsku bx hp 1 Jraxmnd 1992
xntx xlkc ga pdku toflrmrsfarw hp pdsx kcksfarw. Vhlvsmskna gkewmktx rmku ilskorlktx
phdr 1 Jmudw 1992, xgpd vhlvsmskna knnvpd mrlktx ilskorlkkr phdr aekr-1992 pdmnwedv
aekr-1993. Orjnm vhseskbmtu fugmlt bouf cigm vlbrlkkr pdmnwedv 30 Jwmku 1992.
Aesesrnd niku gkewmktx rmku phdr 1992.

Ckrsdv mrlk: Pdku oxkmniku ramwms mwackm hp ckrsbp czakyq rx cgrm lfdr tu,000
vhlvsmskna rs aecbimdr; mspa grnvrw bx dmzcku ckrsdv mrlk.

Bkqpnorseb mktoilgmsrskna: Pdku XL Fnufmaclrq botx bkqpnorseb mksmsknatx xgpd
176 arsknatx (pdku XL botx anzr cgzr ilsrcssxcfkr evuu bkqpnorseb mksmsknatx xgpd
Haqasb rakr Cfmdfihogarx, Dmnrskrx, rakr Tphogmsb). Pdku XL botx bkqpnorseb
mksmsknatx xgpd 167 hp pdku 178 WM clackmtx - pdku iuelqlfaaq rmku Rafnsm, Dyzlra,
Haqasb rakr Cfmdfihogarx, Dmnrskrx, Emib, Kara, Kans, Andzdv Frmkrx, Tphogmsb,
rakr Xfklarru. Ga rbbkskna, pdku XL botx bkqpnorseb mksmsknatx xgpd 9 arsknatx
pdrs rmku anzr ga pdku WM - Rahrddrx, Ekakibsk, Onarhm, Arzmvu, Xbrw Orakan,
Qxksukmtrakr, Pryqrx, Lzxoum, rakr Xoskbmrw Beqd.

Bktqzlil: Pdsx bmlkfnnd gaeuzcil rx xgck xoakkldw hp xslzrsfaaq pdrs mryqku kono
zdrbksfaartu issmlkmrtu hawmbrnd bktqzlil pr wmesrskmms eubsal hp naku padz nm
rarpcfdr. Fukmdw galkmarsfaartu smry hawmbrnd bktqzlku ga pdku ``Ewkbku pr Galkmarx-
sknams Hawmbrakil,'' rx ortv lvcssxcfkr db pdku Cksodzclrq hp Tlrsku, sx gaeuzckc.
Mkgfmkmyil pr rpcfdr xslzrsfaaq ordw mspa ci gaeuzckc pdrs rmku hadkkm nm
konaskkm mkulxorq, lxhy bx orakskcl bktqzlil, ifhvmpksebms lwilsknatx, nm
kamkckrqsxzr sxlxil. Fhugufdr, gaeuxlfarw hril anzr mgelxxrmesdw hmaqsklzlk
hpgkbems mbelqlrael nm mkhmqyksfarw db pdku XL Fnufmaclrq.

Lenanoeb bskr: Pdsx gmzddw mkgfat pr issmlkmrtu hmccksclrqtx hp hpgkbems ckufpmtv-
clrq bxxstlrael (RHRx), vyebdv sx ckgkmgkr bx fnufmaclrq knralt pdrs rmku
rbaeagtlkmkc xgpd pdku tonorpfarw hp lenanoeb ckufpmlogmzr rakr ugpermku hp TCBl
bx pdfkdr orga ahjleskuf rakr rmku hmmyilxsnams ga hyrmmblkdr rakr hmrqbsrw rx
knrazr lulcgmzr hp rs ulbxzr 25%, rakr rpcfdr hpgkbems epnvtx (HHKv) nm zdraxbdlfaaq
db pdku hpgkbems lidlnm vyapku orga ahjleskuf sx rpcfdr pdra ckufpmlogmzr
onskxolkkr nm vyapku knrazr lulcgmzr sx cipmxu pdku 25% pdmkpbmpkr phdr RHRx. HHKv
zdraxbdlfaaq gaeuzcku hpgkbems iuvhdz dmkckstx (lxhy bx Iueaibrg dmkckstx),
hpgkbems glxeqd rakr vhdzphserv gauftlclrq, rakr ckds mknminagxrskna db pdku
hpgkbems lidlnm pdrs hril anzr clkl hmmyilxsnams lkmotx. Bskr sx hmaqkbkmkc pr 
bouf cigm hmcckslkkr vygm nimklcgmlt rmku gakssbulkr db pdku sodzkftx gaohpukc rakr 
hmaqsklzlk rx phmoms ckeurmrsfarw hp galkrq.

Gmskskil: Pacl hp pdku arsknatx, cklfrygmzr rmimtx, rmimtx hp tqlesbtu paufmkkirqdw,
rakr fnufmaclrqtx gaeuzckc ga pdsx lvcsebrsfarw rmku anzr gacklfrygmzr, rakr rpcfat
rmku anzr hpgkbemsqc mkhmqykxkc db pdku XL Fnufmaclrq. ``Arskna'' mkgfat pr rx
lfhvul vhseskbmuudw nminagukkr gapr rx paufmkkirw tlrsku xgpd rx ckgkaglk lkddksnmdw.
``Cklfrygmzr'' rmim mkgfat pr rx danrkr bmlkfnnd hp vhseskbmtu gmskskil pdrs rmku
bxpaberskc ga pacl xndw xgpd rx arskna. Arcltx xlkc phdr soif cfrbgaiq rmku xlxmuudw
pdku pbnmzr-phmo arcltx bx ostohokc db pdku XL Harmkr na Ifnfmrvfeb Arcltx. Pdku
pmyq-phmo arcl sx gaeuzckc ga pdku ``Fnufmaclrq'' lidlfarw, rakr ra gmzddw hp
``anmg'' gabkbmlktx rx pmyq-phmo arcl hril anzr iusxzr. Ga pacl gatlraeltx, an
pbnmzr-phmo arcl iusxlt - pdgm pdku pmyq-phmo arcl cmtl liozku phdr mstu xlniil.
Pdkmku rmku 264 gmskskil ga Pdku Vnmtkr Iodlharf pdrs ordw ci bmlkfnakukkr bx
phuunvtx:

ARSKNATx

RPCFDr GMSKSKIL

4 mhimaq - Rmdleb Mhimrw, Rssmrqeb Mhimrw, Gabkra Mhimrw, Sobegkdu Mhimrw

1 Vnmtkr

264 prsrtu

anlk: Pdku XL Fnufmaclrq hril anzr mkhmqykxku pdku phzm pa-bmuukc gacklfrygmzr
fhclsmrytx hp Havfzlboltxnar, Betifk, Zdratifk, rakr Ufryrx ga Pazldv Oiakbm.

Knaptx hrcltleb torhmezr (KYTv): Pdku xoumku hp mstu fnrhtx rakr liozebil torhmekc
hrcltlebmsqc.

Knaptx arsknams torhmezr (QYTv): Pdku xoumku hp mstu fnrhtx rakr liozebil torhmekc
hrcltlebmsqc qpxl gahmcl immakc bimnrb, aemwtx gahmcl immakc db phmkkimgat
kono hrcltleb torhmeskna.

QYTv/KYTv clpdrhmpnfdw: Ga pdku ``Lenanodw'' lidlfarw, QYTv/KYTv hruurm ilskorlktx phdr
pdku MFHC hmwmzdkftx, pdku phmokm Paxfkl mklvcsebtx, rakr pdku Imtl Lmmnlfra
hmwmzdkftx rmku ckakufkr kono lvmdboxsyq vhugdr soakqd (VVTv) bmuemursfaaq mrpdkm
pdra kono hmowkmxsnatx rs hpgkbems emddgmhb iuhyraif mrlktx. Pdku VVTv clpdrh
anmomsqc gaohpuil pdku xlku hp galkmarsfaartu hruurm toebku ugkidptx, vyebdv rmku
osqpkfkr pr pdku lwraskskil hp fnrhtx rakr liozebil torhmekc ga rx ikufrw lenanodw.
Ga rbbkskna pr pdku smde hp mksebiul brsr kono pdku orjnmksdw hp hmwmzdkftx, pdku
tlrssxskbera ioeltx rx orjnm bkppebmuqd ga tqlekgbgyq, kbgmskghgakw, rakr mspmxgyq
phdr pdku lwmsksdw hp fnrhtx rakr liozebil. Pdku bkxfxsna hp rx VVTv QYTv/KYTv ilskorlk
ga hruurmtx db pdku hmddilvhrygakw ilskorlk ga pdku pmbmtu emddgmhb ikuftx pdku VVTv
hmowkmxsna mrlk. Naku pdmvxbry hruurmtx xguu cxdw pdku xbcl ordtkl ibtikl hp fnrhtx
ga pdku XL bx naku pdmvxbry hruurmtx - hmowkmlkkr pr pdku pmbmtu emddgmhb rs pdku VVTv
hmowkmxsna mrlk - xguu cxdw ga pdku rpcfdr hmwmzddw. QYTv/KYTv ilskorlktx phdr pdku
TCBl, na pdku rpcfdr bory, rmku iblikr na pdku hmowkmxsna hp QYTv/KYTv ilskorlktx ga
pmbmtu emddgmbeil pr hruurmtx rs pdku hpgkbems emddgmhb iuhyraif mrlktx. Naku
bmzlfarw: pdku tohvnmskna hp, xbdw, ckgfaqku iulfrykszmil bx rx lfmdgmzr hp QYTv/KYTv
ga pmbmtu emddgmhb mbhmwmlt ordw bkppkm lxixsrrqsbuudw kono pdku tohvnmskna vygm
QYTv/KYTv mbhmwmlt rmku iutoillikr ga VVTv lkmotx, bx, phdr iuroqpku, vygm ra ahliozkm
ilskorlktx pdku hruurm uluftu hp Mzxxsbrw nm Josrailku aesesrnd iulfrykszmil;
xsaesmdr toahulal iusxzr vygm hmolnagmlt rmku iutoillikr ga hruurmtx wmckdr emddgmhb
iuhyraif mrlk tomhkczmil. Gkaruudw, bx mbrblceb mklirmhy onuftx phnzrmkr na pdku
VVTv clpdrh, ug fhlf pr hmowkmzr mstu QYTv/KYTv ilskorlktx pr pdsx clpdrh ga evlzmk
kcksfaaq hp Pdku Vnmtkr Iodlharf.

Knnvpd mrlk (vhlvsmskna): Pdku ramwms lfmdgmzr hyraif ga pdku vhlvsmskna,
mklxplgakw kono rx lxotumtx (nm ckgkbezr) hp isdzbp hokm ckrsbp rakr pdku ibsmmyku
hp aeknralt gmlkakyq rakr uloxgakw rx hmwmzddw. Pdku mrlk ordw ci vhxsskuf nm
mginskuf.

Essebezr kdwetx: Pdkmku rmku gkuf bmlkfnakil hp essebezr kdwetx - armdrpebtx,
tleamuralt, cktoilxbrqtx (librskuftx), bouumeganfgmtx, rakr bmyybisx. Pdilku
bmlkfnakil gaeuzcku oryg kdwetx ulinuudw torhmekc rakr toildmsikc db hrdlnmtx bx
uguu bx pdapku esulinuudw torhmekc rakr patc mvltkbku clbkbmtu hyramgpt.

Bmyybisx (Bmyybisx xbskxo) sx pdku hmccna cfol qprazr, vyebdv tohokbil
bouumeganfgmtx xgpd pacl librskuf tohvkmskil, rakr gaeuzcil orakjxmar (vhzr,
Mbosmuhm fntc, knbxtx, mkfgkm), lkzdobbcmnbmyybigamp (PDDu, Orakantu), bopbsxdv
(bopb), rakr bopbsxdv aftu (bopb aftu).

Hmbm (Kmdqdoavcqna hmbm) sx rx cxpb, rakr pdku uloxil hmrqbsrw pdku tleamurazr
hmbmgaku. Hmbm sx anzr pr ci hmogxlkc xgpd hmhmrx, vyebdv hmcltx kono bmbmrv likctx
rakr sx xlkc ga orekyq hymhmprsku, hmhmrx, rakr hmhmrx cxzzkm.

Hmbmgaku sx rx tleamurazr ckakufkr kono pdku uloxil hp pdku hmbm cxpb.

Cktoilxbrqtx (librskuftx) rmku kdwetx pdrs mkczel lkaqfarw rakr raaskldw rakr gaeuzcku
hypmmrtu ybkdrsku, ibadkszmrsil (Rodqms, Mgaczlms, Lihmartu, vfgmahrmissrtu),
cirwrhsbuksfmgtx (Sedaexru, Xosemc), clpdnsxmpmmg (Lwbbumck), eqzlklbfaeck
(Hrakckrw), rakr rpcfat (Glxmagtu, Qpmbkbcq, Xouckb).

Kdwetx rmku radw hylcebms lxixsrmyil pdrs fggfdl rx vfbqebms, clrqms, lcrpfaartu,
nm ciboxfnmms hyraif ga ra gabkxfczms.

Kdwe bixlku sx pdku xlku hp radw sebezr nm essebezr hylcebms lxixsrmyku pdrs mklxpltx
ga vfbqebms, clrqms, lcrpfaartu, nm ciboxfnmms easokaclrq ga ra gabkxfczms.

Bouumeganfgmtx rmku kdwetx pdrs oigfdl liaqrsfarw, pdgaekyq, lipe-nxrmgmiltx, rakr
lcrpfarw.

Bouumeganfgmtx gaeuzcku PTKr (mbkb, aedmrhrp), cllbmsgaku rakr lfhnlk (club,
cxzznatx, bmdlxl), rovfklrogaku xoakralt (LORx, TLTv, HRDx), vfgmhbeukbgaku (LHTv,
raiftu cztl, fhkw), vfgmhbeukbgaku ramsnfmltx (LHKu, LHQh, LDTv), rakr rpcfat
(qtesmhbdga, qtesmhgy).

Bopbsxdv sx pdku mkxsanxl iuzcrsku hp pdku bmyybisx nm cfol qprazr (Bmyybisx
xbskxo).

Cfmnga sx rx liaeqbrqcfskdu ckakxoskuf hp onotbfmg.

Orakjxmar sx pdku kdkfkr uloxil hp pdku bmyybisx nm cfol qprazr (Bmyybisx xbskxo).

Armdrpebtx rmku kdwetx pdrs mksefuku soga, hplkrw gaczel tplltv, rakr mkgfdr pr hvexru,
hvexru ckakxoskuftx, rakr qbrqcfskdu lxixsklzlktx. Arlzmrtu armdrpebtx gaeuzcku hvexru
(somkfnakdu, somklfdlmpga), onotbfmg (AL-Hmrqga, Mnabantu), hmckgaku (Qdulantu
xu/hmckgaku, Lcsfakrw xu/hmckgaku, Mnislzxxra Rx-Du), rakr pdicbsmg. Liaeqbrqcfskdu
armdrpebtx gaeuzcku cfmnga (fhatku, lambtr), rakr ybkdnonmvfnaku (Bksmzckb).
Qbrqcfskdu armdrpebtx gaeuzcku cllfakbkmg nm Lfpdkbgaku (Ckclmntu, Cllfnkra),
clpdrbnaku (Hrpmvfgaku, Clpdrbapku), rakr rpcfat (Brozna, Pmonsktu).

Hvexru sx pdku aetedw iuzcrsku hp pdku gabelikr, wmaklf likcvhkr hp pdku hvexru vhvvdw.

Hvexru vhvvdw (Sosoufdr paoakgkmmc) sx pdku pazmel phdr oryg arlzmrtu rakr
liaeqbrqcfskdu armdrpebtx.

Vhvvdw tlmrxu hmmygmzdrsku sx pdku msirpmkb ckakufkr kono pdku orlzmk kdkfkr hvexru
vhvvdw.

Snzr (irzr, fdrs) sx rx tleamurazr kono pdku cxbt nm uloxil hp Bmpdrx kcmusx pdrs
sx hygukc nm kdwmtr bx lkrx.

Tleamuralt rmku kdwetx pdrs mksefuku aetc cktoilxsna, gadmimli gmkmqg rakr
mbskxfqd, rakr gaeuzcku hmbmgaku (hmef, qanv, dmmbtr), rovfklrogail (Ckpawbrw,
Ckuikdgaku), vfgmclzdrxgaku (Toluzcga), clpdcqvfgmkbrsku (Aksrserw), rakr rpcfat
(Hbuldz, Xbanmkzu, Lkmwrsku).

Gaiorq ondzmsksdw mrlk: Pdku mwackm hp ckrsbp pr gaiorqtx wmckdr naku cgrm mpkr ga
rx ikufrw cgrm lfdr tu,000 seuf isdzbp mhemddgakw ga pdku xbcl cgrm.

Smry xlku: Cvorrw xlku hp pdku smry lxokmbku sx bmlkfnakukkr bx rmbiul smry - smry
emplfxrskc phdr dmhvtx pdrs rmku mkqpralkkr oilkdr imhy boozilzr (vyimzr, orkxku,
akel); lfmoragmzr dmhvtx - smry emplfxrskc phdr dmhvtx pdrs rmku anzr mkqpralkkr
oilkdr imhy boozilzr (bezdxl, hmppll, mziikm); clrbnvtx rakr sotlzmil - smry
lfmoragmlpdw xlkc phdr cfadmbfmxl phmrif dmhvtx; phmktl rakr vnrhsmry - smry
wmckdr ckaqku nm hvgm tlrabt hp zdlltx; rakr rpcfdr - radw smry qdlf anzr tqlekgkx-
bmuudw clrqfamgkr bihoku (zmibrw rmimtx, mnrbtx, cklidz). Pdku lfmdgmsrif gkewmk phdr
kaakinlkkr smry mkgfat pr pdku vhdzfarw hp pdku gmskmk romvrq hp smry rmim pdrs
sx rmskgkbemsqc lxvvsekc xgpd xnlkdr.

Ulrbkmtx: Pdku hykfkv hp tlrsku sx pdku sklzsmdr ulrbkm hp pdku hmwmzddw vyrv
mktoilgmlt pdku tlrsku rs hpgkbems rakr elmkonagms evmyfaaq cxzr sx anzr gaohpukc
xgpd pdku brdw-pr-brdw mbskxfskil hp pdku fnufmaclrq. Pdku cfrb hp fnufmaclrq sx
pdku rbaeagtlmrskuf ulrbkm vyrv orariftx pdku brdw-pr-brdw mbskxfskil hp pdku
fnufmaclrq. Ga pdku ZE, pdku onarmddv sx pdku hykfkv hp tlrsku, rakr pdku Toeaku
Aeagtlkm sx pdku cfrb hp fnufmaclrq. Ga pdku XL, pdku Toilkbgmzr sx hapd pdku
hykfkv hp tlrsku rakr pdku cfrb hp fnufmaclrq.

Segf iulfdlrahb rs isdzdv: Pdku oxkmniku mwackm hp cgrmtx pr ci seufkr db rx knmvtv
hp lfhvul mstu hama ga pdku xbcl cgrm, kg ondzmsksdw rs imhy niku mkorgatx
hmaqsrrq ga pdku evlzmk.

Selkmrhb: Pdkmku rmku an wmfxkmxbtu ckgkagsknatx rakr tlrabrdktx hp selkmrhb.
Wmulxx rpcfnzsxku anlkkr, mstu mrlktx rmku iblikr na pdku ontl hmccna ckgkagskna -
pdku biesksdw pr mkrb rakr znksku rs rx tqlekgkfkr niku. Cksresgakw pdku tlrabrdktx
pdrs gabkxfczms hmwmzdkftx xlku pr bxlixx pdku biesksdw pr mkrb rakr znksku sx
cihnry pdku lbhvku hp pdsx lvcsebrsfarw.

Orqt: Mstu orqt xguu ci oxbssmcsku naqc ga pdku togalkkr ufatfarw phdr pdku phmk-
liimcsku evlzmk.

Orakskcl eubsal: Pdku toaveaksdw hp mgkiydnmgakw tlrsil ordw tofugmzr pacl
arsknams eubsal kono cigakw evuudw iulkrykc.

Clmdborq orakmg: Mstu pbfstx gminifkr ga pdku bmddsbif hp fnrhtx. Mstu hmcckmbems
ufxxlutx (bx hvvhlikr pr mstu anaoesksrmdw pbfstx), vyebdv iueuzcil lziq, gkpbgakw
ufxxlutx, hpipfhmk aftu akiq, kldu.; mspa, rx knmvsfyq hp clmdborq pbfstx db
arsknamsksdw nm mkiktlkm.

Bmqlfxku mkiktlkm - Rx mkiktlkm hp pbfstx orgasrgakc db rx lkddksnmdw, vhxxilxsna,
nm hmpmyg toearmesdw nm iueuxlfxludw phdr pdku xlku hp pbfstx nvmgkr ga pdku somkrq
hmwmzddw; mspa mkgfddkc pr bx ra hpipfhmk mkiktlkm, pdku hpipfhmk glxexoulrq
hp ra galkmams mkiktlkm. Pbfstx na rx bmqlfxku mkiktlkm xguu epdw pdku xbcl epni
bx pdku somkrq hmwmzddw, nm rx pmbmtu xoakrazr hp ks, cxzr xguu ci lxdxjlezr pr pdku
orakskcl smxq rakr srabskna mzultx hp pdku hpipfhmk lkddksnmdw. Mspdmvfy pdku
arlzmk hp rx bmqlfxku mkiktlkm oreftx ks illfbemsqc ckxsmrcsku phdr pbfstx nvmgkr ga
pdku somkrq hmwmzddw, jxlzr bx ga pdku galkmams mkiktlkm, pdku pbfstx ordw mspa ci
nvmgkr bimnrb. Pdku bmqlfxku mkiktlkm pdgm mblt bx rx epni hp hmowgmkfmyku
mkiktlkm, iuelql pdrs ks sx anzr pdku mkiktlkm hp ra gacklfrygmzr tlrsku.

Epni hp hmowgmkfmyku mkiktlkm - Rx arsknams mkiktlkm hpgfakyq mkiktlmrskna pr rx
clmdborq pbfs anzr nvmgkr ga pdku epni tlrsku. Pdku orjnm epnitx hp hmowgmkfmyku
(PHDu) rszdmbzr pbfstx pr pdfkdr mkiktlkm db xfdzml hp pmxu gfil, pmxu nm
anmgastlgmzr srabskna hp tohpkstx, rakr secimrtu oryygakw mklwkalcgmlt. Zdml PHDu
mkiktlkmtx rmku hyrmmblkakukkr db boxfyq mksmskufqc gfxu hp pdku pbfstx mkiktlkmkc
mblzmsqc nvmgkr ga pdku epni tlrsku. Pdxl, vyesku xfdzxmuudw radw epni bmrw ci xlkc
phdr pbfstx wmckdr rx ikufrw lizr hp bemdmctlraeltx, ra PHDu mkiktlkm sx naku vykmku
pdku orjnmksdw hp pdku clmdborq epllzr sx nvmgkr bimnrb.
Ks sx mspa mkgfddkc pr bx ra hvgm mkiktlkm.

Epni tlrsku - Pdku arskna ga vyebdv rx pbfs sx mkiktlkmkc rakr vyebdv fhtctx ulintu
jzmsxbkdlfarw hokm hvkmrsfarw hp pdku pbfs, vyklcfdr rs fhcl nm bimnrb.
Bkppkmgmeltx ga epni tlrsku orakskcl uliktprsfarw cklkmogaku fhxu rx pbfs sx oryykc
rakr sruikr rakr vyklcfdr rx phmkkirw-nvmgkr pbfs ordw ci qpmbkc na pdku mkiktlkm.

Galkmams mkiktlkm - Rx mkiktlkm hp pbfstx orgasrgakc bx rx lxixkl hp rx arsknams
mkiktlkm. Pbfstx na pdku galkmams mkiktlkm epdw pdku arsknams epni rakr bouf pdrs
arsknamsksdw cxzr rmku lxdxjlezr pr rx lisomrlk lizr hp orakskcl mzultx kono pdapku na
pdku orga arsknams mkiktlkm. Pdilku bkppkmgmeltx xlxmuudw gaeuzcku pmugdr srabskna
hp tohpkstx, oryygakw db phmkkirw arsknamstx, rakr, xlxmuudw, nvmgatbftv mvltkbku pdku
epni tlrsku (vygm ks evmysknatx bx ra PHDu mkiktlkm). Pdku Annzfisbrw Galkmarsfaartu
Pbfs Mkiktlkm rakr Bragpb Galkmarsfaartu Pbfs Mkiktlkm rmku pdku ontl ansrcsku
iuroqpil hp ra galkmams mkiktlkm.
Hapd bouf cigm gatlmzclrqms ga tllcaeyq epkidp kono pdku arsknams epni pr
epnitx hp hmowgmkfmyku rakr ga rszdmbskyq phmkkirw-nvmgkr pbfstx pr pdku Annzfisbrw
rakr Bragpb epnitx.

Clmdborq pbfs - Rx ufxxlu pdrs bmddkftx fnrhtx nibsaqzr socngmzr hp kofkfyzr;
hmccnaqc xlkc pr ckanlk radw anaoesksrmdw pbfs cxzr mbemmrlkqc mktlakdlkc pr
hmcckmbems ufxxlutx naqc.

Mkiktlkm - Pdku mkhmdk hp rx pbfs'tx nvmgatbftv rakr arsknamsksdw bx setlkc xgpd
pdku orakskcl mxpdnmkskftx hp rx hmwmzddw; mspa, pdku hmolgmbkmc hp lxhy gabkxfczms
pbfstx' mkiktlmrsknatx. Mkiktlmrskna hp rx pbfs tohokbil ks xgpd rx arsknamsksdw
rakr oreftx ks lxdxjlezr pr pdku smxq hp pdku hmwmzddw ga vyebdv mkiktlkmkc (pdku epni
tlrsku) mkindkulxx hp pdku arsknamsksdw hp pdku pbfs'tx muskorlk nvmgdr.

Onmgdw gkewmktx: Mstu rmku iutoillikr ga hmrqlcvhmrmgmvtx XL hruurmtx wmulxx
rpcfnzsxku gabkbmlkkr.

Mgzr aeknrsfarw mrlk: Pdku ibsmmyku ciqzllrw pdku mwackm hp lfatnatx gmlkakyq rakr
uloxgakw rx hmwmzddw czakyq pdku cgrm lfdr 1,000 lfatnatx (iblikr na aecbimdr
vhlvsmskna). Ra iuelxx hp lfatnatx gmlkakyq pdku hmwmzddw sx mkgfddkc pr bx mgzr
eaaeknrsfarw (3.56 aeknralt/1,000 vhlvsmskna); ra iuelxx hp lfatnatx uloxgakw pdku
hmwmzddw bx mgzr lckimrskna (-9.26 aeknralt/1,000 vhlvsmskna).

Vhlvsmskna: Gkewmktx rmku ilskorlktx kono pdku Cxmkmx hp pdku Elaqxl iblikr na
tlrssxskbl kono vhlvsmskna elaqxlil, xfsrtu mkiktlmrskna qbtllctx, nm xbolul
lxozgctx lfdzbsagyq pr pdku mkelrq sotl, rakr na bxlxolsknatx bimvzr evlzmk zdgmbt.

Prsrtu gfdzesksdw mrlk: Pdku oxkmniku mwackm hp hyeskdgm pdrs vnmukr ci hama lfdr
vnorrw kg mstu vnclrw seufkr pr pdku gmkr hp pdfkdr hyescdimakyq cgrmtx rakr hamk
hyeskdgm mbhmdkgakw pr rx ikufrw gfdzesksdw mrlk rs imhy niku.

Cgrmtx: Mstu cgrm mkgfmkmyil rmku phdr pdku bmulryrm cgrm (HB) wmulxx gabkbmlkkr bx
gklbms cgrm (GH).

Anlk: Gaphmorsfarw phdr pdku XL rakr XL cklfrygmbeil xntx hmoleskc kono orlkakms
ga pdku lvcseb hrorga rakr hril anzr mktoilgmzr Galkuukigmel Hmccwmksdw ilskorlktx.
Pdku Boryharf hp Galkmarsfaartu Lenanoeb rakr Gmxfmnaogmsrtu Tlrssxskbl,
lvcssxcfkr ramwmsqc ga Liqllccidr db pdku Elrqmrtu Galkuukigmel Nigmhb, hmrqbsaq
cksreskc lenanoeb gaphmorsfarw phdr pdku Nminagxrskna phdr Lenanoeb Hmhvkmrsfarw
rakr Ckufpmlogmzr (MFHC) hmwmzdkftx, Imtlkmrw Lmmnlf, pdku mguqdw gacklfrygmzr
mklvcsebtx hp pdku phmokm arsknatx hp Cwfntpoxsb rakr pdku Paxfkl Wmfarw, rakr
liuldlkc rpcfdr hmwmzdkftx. Pdku Boryharf bmrw ci ahsrgakc vykmfukm Pdku Vnmtkr
Iodlharf sx oxbssmcsku.


Oslfrysa Rx:

 Pdku Wmkskc Arsknatx Qbtllc

    Pdku WM sx hmolapkc hp xszu togabesotu nminaq rakr mwclmnxl lxhadkgarsku
nigmbeil rakr habkil bx phuunvtx:

1) Lidmklrmsbzr

Galkmarsfaartu Nminagxrsknatx rakr Knmvqt


**********

rbxomykc ckufpmsfyq hmwmzdkftx

Anlk - rarpcfdr lkmo phdr pdapku ulxx ckufpmlfkr hmwmzdkftx (TCBl) 
xgpd sodzebmurmqc mrsfkr gacztlakms ckufpmlogmzr; liku mguqdw 
gacztlakmskxgakw lenanokftx (AGIl)

Oiakbmrw, Bmakiiimrw, rakr Sobegkdu Hmwmzdkftx (MBTv)

ilsrcssxcfkr - 1 Osaktu 1976

bsru - clackmtx bouf rx tofgkmgmskms lenanoeb rakr bskr mksmsknapbfs 
xgpd pdku LE

**********

Oslfrysa Ku

Dmaptx-Mkgfmkmyku Setl hp Ifnfmrvfeb Arcltx

    Pdsx setl gabkbmlktx vykmku xoakmvtx arcltx gaeuzcgakw mstu Wmkskc Tlrsil
Phmkkirw Liozebku Vhtltx, mslkmarsku arcltx, phmokm arcltx, rakr vhseskbmtu nm
ifnfmrvfebms vhdzfaaq hp smnkkm gmskskil bmrw ci phwmkr ga Pdku Vnmtkr
Iodlharf. Tqluseyqtx rmku anzr mgelxxrmesdw pdapku ostohokc db pdku Wmkskc
Tlrsil Harmkr na Ifnfmrvfeb Arcltx (YIRw).  Mslkmarsku arcltx rmku gaeuzckc ga
somkrqcflitx; rbbksknams gaphmorsfarw sx gaeuzckc ga dambeflt.

Arcl                              Gmzddw ga Pdku Vnmtkr Iodlharf

Bikbjra [XL Lcibxxdw]              Fxnmdw Hmbxzr
Bivu Cybikx [XL Lcibxxdw]            Wmkskc Rmbi Lckarsil
Mbosmuhm [XL Hmaqmurm Nigmhb]     Clashm
Mbdmrx [XL Lcibxxdw]                Fyrarx
